analyzed: droṇaparva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_7.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
suravratam hatam śrutvā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ti duḥkhitaḥ
muhur muhur yaśaḥ rāśim tam aśocat ariṃdamam
punar saṃgrāmam ālokya samāyātaḥ tha saṃjayaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ vaicitravīryeṇa vīra saṃhāram abhyadhāt
tatas bhīṣma īhate rājan kuravaḥ bhṛśa duḥkhitāḥ

original: abdhau bhagne pravahaṇe vaṇijaḥ patitā iva // Bhmj_7.4 //
analyzed: abdhau bhagne pravahaṇe vaṇijaḥ patitāḥ iva
vāñchitam samare śarma dadṛśuḥ karṇam āgatam
vikrītāḥ para deśeṣu snigdham bandhum iva āpadi
tatas duryodhanaḥ śokam saṃstambhya dhṛti sāgaraḥ

original: karṇasyānumate cakre droṇaṃ senāsu nāyakam // Bhmj_7.6 //
analyzed: karṇasya anumate cakre droṇam senāsu nāyakam
tena abhiṣiktaḥ vidhivat guruḥ sarva dhanuṣmatām

original: sa babhau śaktimānvīro mahāsena ivāparaḥ // Bhmj_7.7 //
analyzed: sa babhau śaktimān vīraḥ mahāsenaḥ iva aparaḥ
vṛddhasya sva yaśaḥ śubhram chattram tasya vyarocata
dugdha udadheḥ iva śrīmat candra maṇḍalam udyatam
āmukta hema kavacaḥ sa dīptaḥ kiraṇaiḥ babhau
upasthitaiḥ kṛtya kāle divya astraiḥ iva sevitaḥ
praṇetā sarva vīrāṇām sadṛśaḥ prājya tejasā
sākṣāt iva dhanurvedaḥ saṃhārasya āgama avadhiḥ
reje rathena raukmena śoṇa aśvena patākinā
saṃdhyā juṣā nirjhariṇā meruṇā iva divākaraḥ
virarāja rathe tasya śātakaumbhaḥ kamaṇḍaluḥ

original: śauryoṣmaṇā pratigataḥ pratāpa iva piṇḍitaḥ // Bhmj_7.12 //
analyzed: śaurya ūṣmaṇā pratigataḥ pratāpaḥ iva piṇḍitaḥ
ākarṇa palitaḥ śyāmaḥ dhaureyaḥ sarva dhanvinām

original: dadau varaṃ śriyā juṣṭaḥ sa rājñā svayamarthitaḥ // Bhmj_7.13 //
analyzed: dadau varam śriyā juṣṭaḥ sa rājñā svayam arthitaḥ
jīva grāham samādāya rājānam te yudhiṣṭhiram
pradāsyāmi paśyatām sarva bhubhujām
etat guru vacaḥ rājā pratigṛhya kṛtāñjaliḥ
viśrāvya nija senāsu tūrya nāda utsavam vyadhāt
tat ca dharmasutaḥ jñātvā saha gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
krauñca vyūham samādhāya saṃnaddhaḥ yoddhum udyayau
dromena śakaṭa vyūhe nirmite bhṛśa saṃhate
avartata mahat yuddham vīrāṇām deha śātanam
tatas sṛñjaya pāñcāla matsya senāsu duḥsahāḥ
śarīra hāriṇaḥ petuḥ dreṇa nāma aṅkitāḥ śarāḥ
bhidyamāneṣu sainyeṣu nipatat gaja vājiṣu
rakta kallolinī vegaiḥ nīteṣu syandaneṣu api
yudhiṣṭhira mukhān vīrān kopāt droṇam abhidrutān
avārayan su saṃrabdhān droṇi karṇa kṛpa ādayaḥ
abhimanyuḥ atha ākṛṣya rathāt keśeṣu pauravam
apātayat kṛpāṇena paśyatām sarva dhanvinām
tad kopāt khaṅgam ādāya jayadratham upāgatam

original: śalyaṃ ca virathaṃ vīro vidadhe balināṃ varam // Bhmj_7.22 //
analyzed: śalyam ca viratham vīraḥ vidadhe balinām varam
tatas śalyaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ padbhyām saubhadram ādravat
gadayā vīra vārinyā bhīmaḥ ca tam avārayat
tayoḥ paraspara āghāta kīrṇa vahni kaṇā ākulam
nṛṇām vimohanam ghoram gadā yuddham avartata
maṇḍalāni carantau tau sa madau iva kuñjarau
abhipatya padāni aṣṭau gadābhyām jaghnatuḥ mithas
gāḍha prahāra saṃjāta mūrchā vihvala mānasau

original: tau dṛṣṭvā patitau vīrāḥ saṃnipetuḥ prahāriṇaḥ // Bhmj_7.26 //
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā patitau vīrāḥ saṃnipetuḥ prahāriṇaḥ
nīte madra adhipe tūrṇam rathena kṛtavarmaṇā
bhīmasenaḥ samādāya kuru senām adārayat
karṇa sūnoḥ atha śaraiḥ dṛṣasenasya pāṇḍavāḥ
ākīrṇān draupadī putrān vilokya tam upādravan
tatas rukmarathaḥ droṇaḥ svayam pāñcāla vāhinīm
praviśya bāṇaiḥ vidadhe viprakīrṇām sahasradhā
śikhaṇḍi sātyaki mukhān sa vidārya mahā rathān
yudhiṣṭhiram abhiprekṣuḥ kurvan narapati kṣayam
yugaṃdharam vyāghradattam sihasenam ca pārthivam
nināya mṛtyu sadana śaraiḥ aśani dāruṇaiḥ
tiṣṭha sthitaḥ ha hataḥ si iti muhur muhur
droṇa agre yudhyamānānām bhūbhujām abhavat raṇaḥ
droṇena yudhyamānānām niśamya śvetavāhanaḥ

original: kolāhalaṃ svasainyānāṃ tūrṇaṃ taṃ deśamāyayau // Bhmj_7.33 //
analyzed: kolāhalam sva sainyānām tūrṇam tam deśam āyayau
sa nihatya astra jālena vīraḥ kuru varūthinīm
vidadhe rakta taṭinīm āvarta hṛta kuñjarām
tatas vahāram sainyānām pārtha sāyaka pīḍitāḥ
yāte stam tigmakiraṇe cakrire kuru puṃgavāḥ
droṇa abhiṣekaḥ prathamaḥ yuddha divasaḥ ca
niśāyām saṃniviṣṭeṣu śibire sarva rājasu
lajjamānaḥ iva ācāryaḥ duryodhanam abhāṣata
uktam eva mayā rājan rahitam savyasācinā

original: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ grahīṣyāmi durjayo hi dhanaṃjayaḥ // Bhmj_7.37 //
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiram grahīṣyāmi durjayaḥ hi dhanaṃjayaḥ
iti bruvāṇe vailakṣyāt ācārye rāja saṃnidhau
trigarva rājaḥ provāca kṛta vairaḥ kirīṭinā
vayam saṃśaptaka gaṇaiḥ mālavaiḥ tuṇḍilaiḥ tathā
vīraiḥ madraka kāmboja lalitaiḥ ca prahāribhiḥ
ratha ayutaiḥ tribhiḥ pārtham āhūya pṛthak āsthitaḥ
yotsyāmahe su prakṛtaiḥ iti satyam śapāmahe
iti ukte śapatham kṛtvā trigartāḥ vahni sākṣiṇaḥ
pratyūṣe niryayuḥ vīrāḥ suśarma pramukhāḥ nṛpāḥ
te turaṅga khara uddhūta dhūli grasta nabhastalāḥ
cakrire phalguṇa āhvānam nādaiḥ pralaya śaṃsibhiḥ
tān vyūhena ardhacandreṇa same deśe vyavasthitān
dṛṣṭvā pārthaḥ tadā āhūtaḥ yudhiṣṭhiram abhāṣata
anujānātu mām āryaḥ trigartānām vadham prati
ete mām abhivāñcanti yoddhum saṃgharṣa śālinaḥ

original: ayaṃ te satyajidvīraḥ pāñcālyaḥ pravaro rathaḥ /
analyzed: ayam te satyajit vīraḥ pāñcālyaḥ pravaraḥ rathaḥ
goptā droṇa abhisaraṇe śakra tulya parākramaḥ
iti uktvā
pralaya ambhoda saṃrabdhaḥ tān yayau kapiketanaḥ
te pi pāṇḍavam āyāntam dṛṣṭvā pramada nirbharāḥ
phulla sālam iva adṛśyam cakruḥ kṣipram śilīmukhaiḥ
tatas śaurya ambudheḥ phenam aṭṭahāsam raṇa śriyaḥ

original: dadhmau dhanaṃjayaḥ śaṅkhaṃ kandaṃ nijayaśastaroḥ // Bhmj_7.48 //
analyzed: dadhmau dhanaṃjayaḥ śaṅkham kandam nija yaśaḥ taroḥ
tasya śabdena mahatā tat sainyam bhaya kāriṇā
abhūt nivṛtta mātaṅgam stimita aṅga turaṅgamam
atha sāyaka jālena jīva matsya apahāriṇā
trigarta vāhinīm pārthaḥ samantāt paryavārayat
tatas saṃśaptaka gaṇa utsṛṣṭaiḥ a vivaraiḥ śaraiḥ
pihite bhuvana ābhoge babhūva akāla śarvarī
tatas pravidadhe tvāṣṭram mahā astram vajrinandanaḥ
yena arjuna sahasrāṇi dadṛśuḥ te sa saṃbhramāḥ
jahāra ākarṇa kṛṣṭena bhallena ca mahā ojasaḥ
sphurat mauli prabhā jālam śiraḥ kāyāt sudhanvanaḥ
tad preṣitām śastra vṛṣṭim pavana astreṇa hāriṇā
vidhūya tad śiraḥ puñjaiḥ adṛśyām vidadhe mahīm
chinna chattra dhvaja ratham patat bhuja bhaṭa ānanam
trigarta kadanam pārthaḥ ghoram āyodhanam vyadhāt
saṃśaptaka yuddham
asmin kṣaṇe vainateya vyūhe droṇena nirmite
vyūhena nirmita ardhena pāṇḍu putrāḥ samudyayuḥ

original: tataḥ pravṛtte saṃgrāme kṣaye caiva mahībhujām /
analyzed: tatas pravṛtte saṃgrāme kṣaye ca eva mahībhujām

original: rajobhiḥ pihite vyomni dikṣu ruddhāsu sāyakaiḥ /
analyzed: rajobhiḥ pihite vyomni dikṣu ruddhāsu sāyakaiḥ
avibhāgam amaryādam ghoram yuddham avartata
abhidrute tatas droṇe dharmarāja jighṛkṣayā
ghoraḥ halahalā śabdaḥ sainyānām udabhūt kṣaṇam

a vārayitum abhyetya satyajit satya vikramaḥ

original: yudhyamānaṃ tato hatvā vṛkaṃ rājasutaṃ guruḥ /

original: śaraiḥ satyajitaṃ cakre kīrṇāṃśumiva bhāskaram // Bhmj_7.61 //

dīptaiḥ apūrayat droṇam khadyotaiḥ iva pādapam
tatas satyajitaḥ kāyāt ācāryaḥ śaurya śālinaḥ
śiraḥ jahāra bhallena caṇḍa tāṇḍava kuṇḍalam
nipātite satyajiti pravare sarva dhanvinām

hṛtvā anujam virāṭasya śatānīkam prahāriṇam

original: dṛḍhasenaṃ kṣatradevaṃ vasudānaṃ ca pārthivam // Bhmj_7.65 //
analyzed: dṛḍhasenam kṣatradevam vasudānam ca pārthivam
nighnan rukmarathaḥ cedi matsya pāñcāla sṛñjayān

saṃhatāḥ pṛthivīpālāḥ kopāt droṇam upādravan
ṛṣya varṇaiḥ hayaiḥ bhīmaḥ sātyakiḥ sphāṭika prabhaiḥ
pārāvata prabhaiḥ ca aśvaiḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ camūpatiḥ
nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca śuka tittiri saprabhaiḥ
abhimanyuḥ piśaṅga ābhaiḥ pāṇḍyaiḥ ca tuhina prabhaiḥ

original: dantaprabhaiḥ kṛṣṇavālaiḥ svayaṃ rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // Bhmj_7.70 //
analyzed: danta prabhaiḥ kṛṣṇa vālaiḥ svayam rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: parivārya raṇe droṇaṃ cakrurbāṇamayaṃ jagat // Bhmj_7.71 //
analyzed: parivārya raṇe droṇam cakruḥ bāṇa mayam jagat
mṛdaṅga nādakau rājñaḥ dhvajaḥ nanda upanandakau

dharma anila indra aśvinām ca pratimāḥ draupadī bhuvām

āvṛtam droṇam ālokya rājabhiḥ krūrayā dhiyā
duryodhana ādayaḥ vīrān bhīma mukhyān samāpatan
teṣu śalya pradhāneṣu yudhiṣṭhira purogamaiḥ
dvandva addha niṣakteṣu samara utsava rājiṣu

original: kṛtabāhau subāhau ca hate vīre yuyutsunā /
analyzed: kṛtabāhau subāhau ca hate vīre yuyutsunā
vaṅga rāje sa mātaṅge bhīmasenena pātite
vidrute kaurava bale nihateṣu abhimāniṣu
nirālokeṣu lokeṣu rajaḥ timira maṇḍalaiḥ
preritaḥ bhagadattena saṃvartaka ghana prabhaḥ
supratīkaḥ mada uddāmaḥ pāṇḍu senām vyagāhata

airāvaṇa ghaṭa ābandhaḥ pramāṇam yasya
śaśi śubhraiḥ nakhaiḥ udyāt ekapād sa kṣaṇam babhau

itas candra arka mukhyānām prabhavaḥ sarva tejasām

digvāraṇa raṇa avāptim vinā vyartham idam balam
iti iva pṛthu śūtkāraiḥ niḥśaśvāsa mada alasaḥ
etāḥ āyāntu vaiklavyam mad pratāpa ūṣmaṇā diśaḥ
iti iva karṇa tālābhyām muhur muhur avījayat
helayā unmīlayan kiṃcid locane pracacāla saḥ
bhagadatta astra niṣkṛtta vīra vaktra añcitām mahīm

original: gatvā pade pade paśyansasmāra kamalākarān // Bhmj_7.85 //
analyzed: gatvā pade pade paśyan sasmāra kamala ākarān

original: sa vāhinīṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ praviśya nibiḍaṃ gajaḥ /

tena mandara tulyena gajena anīka vāridheḥ
samākrāntasya nistriṃśa kālakūṭa chaṭāḥ babhuḥ

original: ākṛṣṭaṃ pāśahastena yena taṃ menire janāḥ // Bhmj_7.89 //
analyzed: ākṛṣṭam pāśa hastena yena tam menire janāḥ

original: saṃśaye patitaṃ bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
analyzed: saṃśaye patitam bhīmam dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
saha sarvaiḥ mahīpālaiḥ bhagadattam samabhyadhāt
sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ vīraiḥ hatvā dāśārṇa bhūpatim
unmamātha ratham vegāt supratīkena sātyake
tasya śīkariṇā ghora śītkṛtena atha dantinaḥ
bhīmasena mukhāḥ dūram jahruḥ trastāḥ turaṅgamān

original: janatā kṛnṛpeṇeva na lebhe śaraṇaṃ kvacit // Bhmj_7.93 //
analyzed: janatā na lebhe śaraṇam kvacid
gajānām patyamānānām rathānām sphuṭatām api
hāhākāraiḥ ca bhītānām niḥsvanaḥ tumulaḥ bhavat
sveṣām ākrandam ākarṇya vajra astreṇa indranandanaḥ
trigartān sa anugān hatvā bhagadattam athā apatat
dṛṣṭvā gāṇḍīvadhanvānam tārkṣya vat tarṇam āgatam
preritaḥ bhagadattena kruddhaḥ dāvat dvipa adhipaḥ
tam antakam iva āyāntam apasavyena keśavaḥ
rathena mogha saṃrambham kṛtvā punar abhūt puras
viddhvā śara sahasreṇa pārtham prāgjyotiṣa īśvaraḥ
nārāyaṇa astram asṛjat tat ca jagrāha keśavaḥ
arjunam rakṣataḥ tūrṇam tat astram kaiṭabhadviṣaḥ
niṣaktam vakṣasi prāpa hema sragdāma vibhramam
tasmin viphala tām yāte mahā astre dīpta tejasi
vailakṣyāt arjunaḥ kṛṣṇam uvāca āsphālayan dhanuḥ
nūnam yuddheṣu ayogyaḥ ham yena astram dhṛtavān asi

catur mūrti mṛtā pūrvam pṛthivī vacasā mayā
vitīrṇam narakāya etat nija astram bhūmi sūnave
amogham āptavān tasmāt detyāt saḥ sau narādhipaḥ

original: gṛhītaṃ tanmayā divyaṃ jahyenamadhunā nṛpam // Bhmj_7.103 //
analyzed: gṛhītam tat mayā divyam jahi enam adhunā nṛpam
ukte janārdanena iti savyasācī sa kuñjaram
ūrdhva vaktraiḥ śaraiḥ kṣipram bhagadattam apūrayat
giri varṣma gaja ārūḍhaḥ bāṇaiḥ prāgjyotiṣa īśvaraḥ
adūra vidruta amartya vimānam akarot nabhaḥ
tatas karṇa anta kṛṣṭena kumbhayoḥ kuñjara īśvaram
ā puccha gāminā pārthaḥ nārācena ākulam vyadhāt
sa phalguṇa iṣu nirbhinnaḥ patin dvirada bhūdharaḥ

original: jaghāna mahītaṃ senāṃ patitāḥ pātayanti yat // Bhmj_7.107 //
analyzed: jaghāna mahītam senām patitāḥ pātayanti yat
kruddhaḥ tatas ūrdhacandreṇa hṛdi viddhaḥ kirīṭinā
mukta aṅkuśa dhanuḥ bāṇaḥ bhagadattaḥ bhavat vyasuḥ
tasmin nipatite vīre kakude sarva bhūbhujām
vijaye kuru senānām āśābandhaḥ ślathaḥ bhavat
vidrute kaurava anīke saubalau vṛṣaka acalau
gāndhārau dhanvinām dhuryai dhanaṃjayam ayudhyatām
tau bāṇa varṣiṇau pārtha śareṇa ekena saṃhatau
syūtau apātayat prītyā yātaḥ bhāruṇḍa tām iva
anujau nihatau dṛṣṭvā śakuniḥ kopa kampitaḥ
kalpayan vipulām māyām savyasācinām ādravat
astraiḥ ca krūra satvaiḥ ca tamobhiḥ ca abhitas vṛtaḥ
na akampata raṇe pārthaḥ tasya māyā śataiḥ api
saureṇa astreṇa tad māyām chittvā kātara mohinīm
prāhiṇot sāyakān yena śakuniḥ prayayau bhayāt
yāteḥ rjuna mayam lokam manyamāne saubale

original: na lebhe śaraṇaṃ trāsādvidrutā kuruvāhinī // Bhmj_7.115 //
analyzed: na lebhe śaraṇam trāsāt vidrutā kuru vāhinī
tatas droṇaḥ saha anīkaiḥ yudhiṣṭhira jighṛkṣayā
haran vaktrāṇi vīrāṇām pāñcālān samupādravat
vadhyamāneṣu anīkeṣu śoṇāśvena sahasraśas
rakta āsava madena iva cakampe vasudhā vadhūḥ

original: tūrṇaṃ praharata droṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ rakṣata saṃgare /
analyzed: tūrṇam praharata droṇam tūrṇam rakṣata saṃgare

original: pāṇḍavānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca babhūveti mahādhvaniḥ // Bhmj_7.118 //
analyzed: pāṇḍavānām pareṣām ca babhūva iti mahā dhvaniḥ
pāñcāleṣu atha bhagneṣu sṛñjayeṣu ca sarvatas
ayodhayat kuru camūm nīlaḥ māhiṣmatī patiḥ
tam dahantam anīkāni divya astraiḥ vahni tejasam
pratyudyayau dhairya nidhiḥ draiṇiḥ ekaḥ dhanurdharaḥ
ācārya sūnuḥ tasya atha vajrasāra iṣu varṣiṇaḥ

original: chattraṃ dhvajaṃ kārmukaṃ ca bhallaiściccheda nirvyathaḥ // Bhmj_7.121 //
analyzed: chattram dhvajam kārmukam ca bhallaiḥ ciccheda nirvyathaḥ
avaruhya rathāt tūrṇam nīlaḥ citra parākramaḥ

original: kṛpāṇena śiro hartuṃ drauṇeḥ śyena ivāpatat // Bhmj_7.122 //
analyzed: kṛpāṇena śiraḥ hartum drauṇeḥ śyenaḥ iva apatat
bhāradvāja sutaḥ tasya bhallena ujjvala kuṇḍalam
kāntam śiraḥ harat tārā yuga yuktam iva uḍupam
nīle hate pāṇḍavānām bhagne su bhaṭa maṇḍale
hatvā saṃśaptakān pārthaḥ java ārtām bhuvam āyayau
bhīma phalguṇa saubhadra matsya caidya mukhaiḥ tatas
bhidyamāne para anīke niḥsvanaḥ tumulaḥ bhavat
tatas karṇa prabhṛtibhiḥ teṣām samara śālinām
ghoraḥ babhūta saṃmardaḥ sarva loka bhayaṃkaraḥ
nirmaryāde raṇe tasmin rūdhira āvarta dustare

original: bhinnāṃ kurucamūṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇaḥ pārthamayodhayat // Bhmj_7.127 //
analyzed: bhinnām kuru camūm dṛṣṭvā karṇaḥ pārtham ayodhayat
sa ūrjunam pāvaka astreṇa sātyaki pramukhān tathā
cakāra ghora digdāha piṅgalān iva bhūdharān
tatas dhanaṃjaya mukhāḥ hatvā astraiḥ astram utkaṭam
karṇam śara śataiḥ cakruḥ ghana vetra vana upamam

original: śatruṃjayaṃ vipāṭaṃ ca vīraṃ cāvarajaṃ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: śatruṃjayam vipāṭam ca vīram ca avarajam śaraiḥ
karṇa anujān yama puram prāhiṇot kapiketanaḥ
karṇa anuja vadhaḥ
atha droṇa mukhāḥ sarve kauravāṇām mahā rathāḥ
karṇa pārśvam samājagmuḥ dīpta astra grāma duḥsahāḥ
te sātyaki prabhṛtibhiḥ saṃsaktāḥ dhanvinām varāḥ
cakrire samaram ghoram gaja vāji ratha kṣayam
tatas ūrjuna śara āsāraiḥ bhinneṣu bhuja śāliṣu
vāsara ante nyavartanta pārthivāḥ bhṛśa pīḍitāḥ
dvītīyaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
tatas prātar samabhyetya gurum duryodhanaḥ bravīt
karṇayan bhṛśa saṃtaptaḥ pāṇḍavānām parākramam
aho nu puṇya hīnasya bhavatā api pratiśrutaḥ

original: vīro niṣphalatāṃ yāto dharmajagrahaṇe mama // Bhmj_7.135 //
analyzed: vīraḥ niṣphala tām yātaḥ dharmaja grahaṇe mama
śaktimanta praṇayinām abhijātāḥ yaśasvinaḥ

original: vṛthā manorathaṃ kartuṃ śikṣitā na bhavadvidhāḥ // Bhmj_7.136 //
analyzed: vṛthā manoratham kartum śikṣitāḥ na bhavadvidhāḥ
śrutvā suyodhanena uktam jagāda kalaśodbhavaḥ
durgrahyaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ rājan guptaḥ gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
tathā api adya karomi eṣa yathāśakti hitam tava
saṃśaptakāḥ punar yāntu ratāt ākṛṣya phalguṇam
ācāryeṇa iti gadite saṃśaptaka gaṇāḥ punar
samāhūya arjunam ninyuḥ dakṣiṇa āśām yuyutsavaḥ
rāma śiṣyaḥ tatas droṇaḥ kṣatriya kṣaya dīkṣitaḥ
saṃsāra cakra durbhedyam cakra vyūham vinirmame
arīṇām ayute tasmin rāja putra ayutam babhau
vyoma nirjhariṇī su accha patākā alaṃkṛtaiḥ bhujaiḥ
na abhimanye śrīmān rājā tasthau suyodhanaḥ
gaja anīkena mahatā vṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ mahā rathaiḥ
jayadrathena sahitaḥ droṇaḥ vyūha mukhaḥ bhavat
triṃśatā tridaśa ākaraiḥ tathā duryodhana anujaiḥ
tat apāram balam dṛṣṭvā vyūham vikrama śālibhiḥ
droṇa nirdārita anīkaḥ pradadhyau dharmanandanaḥ
sa saubhadram raṇe matvā kaṃsāri sama vikramam
babhāṣe saṃnidhau rājñām trailokya vijaya kṣamam
abhimanyo tava pitā yātaḥ saṃśaptakān prati
tad voḍhuḥ mahasi dhuram tvam imām tad guṇa adhikaḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ ūrjunaḥ raukmiṇeyaḥ tvam vā vajri parākramaḥ
pragalbhaḥ pañcamaḥ nā asti cakra vyūha vibhedine
śrutvā etat ūce saubhadraḥ praharṣa utphulla locanaḥ

original: eṣa vyūhaṃ vidāryādya praviśāmi tvadājñayā // Bhmj_7.148 //
analyzed: eṣa vyūham vidārya adya praviśāmi tvad ājñayā
nirgantum anabhijñam mām anuyāntu mahā rathāḥ
ukteḥ juna sutena iti yudhiṣṭhira mukhaiḥ nṛpaiḥ
tathā iti abhihite sūtam saubhadraḥ samacodayat

original: sa muktaśaiśvo vīraḥ kesarīva trihāyanaḥ // Bhmj_7.150 //
analyzed: sa mukta śaiśvaḥ vīraḥ kesarī iva tri hāyanaḥ
manyamānaḥ raṇa mukhe varākam sarva rājakam
kāntaḥ kanka saṃnāhaḥ baddha su aṅgaḥ vibhūṣitaḥ
kautukāt kṣmām iva āyātaḥ vīraḥ sura kumārakaḥ
droṇa anīkam śaraiḥ cakre kṣubhita ambhodhi vibhramam

original: tataḥ pravṛtte samare mahatāmapi mohane // Bhmj_7.153 //
analyzed: tatas pravṛtte samare mahatām api mohane
vidārya vyūham aviśat saubhadraḥ tīkṣṇa vikramaḥ
lāghave sauṣṭhave citre yātam ekam aneka tām

original: dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaṃ taṃ sarve kuruvīrāḥ samādravan /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭam tam sarve kuru vīrāḥ samādravan

original: ayaṃ gṛhīto yāto 'yaṃ hato 'yaṃ hantyayaṃ bahūn // Bhmj_7.155 //
analyzed: ayam gṛhītaḥ yātaḥ yam hataḥ yam hanti ayam bahūn
iti rājñām ninādaḥ būt abhimanyu ratham prati
sa ratna mukuṭaiḥ śīrṣaiḥ sa prāsa asi śaraiḥ karaiḥ
sa hema kavacaiḥ kāyaiḥ sa keyūra aṅgadaiḥ bhujaiḥ
turaṅgaiḥ kṛtta sāraṅgaiḥ bhinna kumbhaiḥ ca kumbhibhiḥ
nipatadbhiḥ aviśrāntaḥ channām cakre sa medinīm

original: vadhyamānaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā saubhadreṇa prahāriṇā // Bhmj_7.158 //
analyzed: vadhyamānam balam dṛṣṭvā saubhadreṇa prahāriṇā
tam ādravan sa saṃrabdhāḥ drauṇi karṇa kṛpa ādayaḥ
tān bāṇa varṣiṇaḥ vīrān vidhāya vimukhān śaraiḥ
śiraḥ jahāra bhallena saubhadraḥ śmaka bhūpateḥ

original: bhagne tato kurubale droṇakarṇakṛpāḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_7.160 //
analyzed: bhagne kuru bale droṇa karṇa kṛpāḥ punar
drauṇi hārdikya gāndhāra śara śalya bṛhadbalāḥ
bhūri bhūriśravaḥ citra duḥśāsana suyodhanāḥ
anye ca abhyetya bhūpālāḥ sāyakaiḥ tam avākiran
kṣipraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ teṣām saṃcchanna ūrjuna nandanaḥ
vasanta samaye kāntaḥ karṇikāraḥ iva ābabhau
tasya pārtha kumārasya kumārasya iva dānavāḥ
śaktyā śaktimataḥ yuddhe nirjitāḥ te pradudruvuḥ

original: madrarājānujaṃ hatvā sa tūrṇaṃ bhīmavikramam // Bhmj_7.164 //
analyzed: madra rāja anujam hatvā sa tūrṇam bhīma vikramam
karṇasya bhrātaram śūram jaghāna ghana garjitam

original: krameṇaikaikaśo jitvā saṃhatāṃśca punaḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_7.165 //
analyzed: krameṇa ekaikaśas jitvā saṃhatān ca punar punar
karṇa duḥśāsana mukhān sa cakre bhūbhujām kṣayam
para sainya antara sthasya dikṣu sarvāsu bhūmipāḥ
hema cāpa sahasrāṇi dadṛśuḥ tasya lāghavāt
gaja vāji ratha anīke dārite tena pattribhiḥ
cāmara uṣṇīṣa hāsa aṅkā prasasarpa asra vāhinī
utthiteṣu kabandheṣu bhagne su bhaṭa maṇḍale
dadhmau pārtha sutaḥ śaṅkham diśaḥ śakalayan iva
atrā antare pāṇḍu sutān praveṣṭum vyūham udyatān
avārayat bharga varāt dṛptaḥ rājā jayadrathaḥ
sa kṛṣṇā haraṇe pūrvam vijitaḥ taiḥ maheśvarāt

original: varaṃ tapaḥ kṛśo lebhe tajjayaṃ phalgumaṃ vinā /
analyzed: varam tapaḥ kṛśaḥ lebhe tad jayam phalgumam vinā
sa babhau pāṇḍu tanayān vārayan sa padānugān
velā acalaḥ iva uddhūtān vāri vegān mahodadheḥ

original: haimaṃ varāhaṃ bibhrāṇo dhvaje vaiśvānaraprabham // Bhmj_7.172 //
analyzed: haimam varāham bibhrāṇaḥ dhvaje vaiśvānara prabham
dadāha pāṇḍava camūm saindhavaḥ rudra tejasā
tena ekena niruddheṣu prasabham pāṇḍu sūnuṣu
abhimanyuḥ viśan rājñām uccakarta śiraḥ vanam

original: vṛṣasenaṃ sa vidrāvya vīro vaikartanātmajam // Bhmj_7.174 //
analyzed: vṛṣasenam sa vidrāvya vīraḥ vaikartana ātmajam
jahāra lulita uṣṇīṣam kāmboja nṛpateḥ śiraḥ

original: tasminvimarde tumule dikṣu ruddhāsu pāṃsubhiḥ // Bhmj_7.175 //
analyzed: tasmin vimarde tumule dikṣu ruddhāsu pāṃsubhiḥ
asūcyanta mahīpālāḥ ratna ābharaṇa raśimabhiḥ
tatas vijaya dāyādaḥ kesarī iva mada dvipam
jagrāha satyaśravasam rājānam atula ojasam
abhimanyoḥ vaśam yāte tasmin bhūmibhṛtām vare
śalya ātmajaḥ rukmarathaḥ tam garjan samupādravat
sa teṣām bhrukuṭī dhūma lakṣya kopa agni saṃpadām
gāndharva astreṇa sahasā vidadhe kīrtiśeṣa tām
tena tulya vayaḥ veśe rāja putra śate hate
rambhā kāṇḍa vane bhagne prabhinnena iva dantinā

original: vidrute bhūbhujāṃ cakre bhagnāmānaḥ suyodhanaḥ // Bhmj_7.180 //
analyzed: vidrute bhūbhujām cakre bhagna āmānaḥ suyodhanaḥ
niḥśaśvāsa hriyā namraḥ saubhadra śara dāritaḥ
tatas duryodhana sutaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ lakṣmaṇa upamaḥ
abhimanyum samabhyetya prāhiṇot viśikha āvalīm
lakṣmī latā kisalayam saṃbhoga taru kandaram
tam rāja putram saubhadraḥ kṣaṇam tulyam ayodhayat
tasya muktā āvalī tārā paṅkti sevitam ānanam
śaśāṅkam iva bhallena kaṇṭha mūlāt jahāra saḥ

original: kauravendrastataḥ kruddhaḥ priye putre nipātite // Bhmj_7.184 //
analyzed: kaurava indraḥ tatas kruddhaḥ priye putre nipātite
saubhadram ādravat vīraḥ saha sarvaiḥ mahā rathaiḥ
nṛpa vaikartan droṇa drauṇi hārdikya gautamān
śaraiḥ vidrāvya tarasā vṛndārakam apātayat
kopāt āpatataḥ saḥ u tha kosala adhipateḥ śiraḥ
bṛhadbalasya ciccheda bhallena ākula kuṇḍalam
tatas karṇam abhidrutya śaraiḥ aśani dāruṇaiḥ
nināya saṃśaya tulām mṛtyu daṃṣṭra aṅkuraiḥ iva
nipātya karṇa sacivān rāja putrān prahāriṇaḥ
jaghāna mārtikam bhojam tathā kuñjarekatanam

original: dauḥśāsaniṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pṛṣatkena parāṅbhukham // Bhmj_7.189 //
analyzed: dauḥśāsanim tatas kṛtvā pṛṣatkena parāṅbhukham
vidhāya viratham śalyam śara jālaiḥ amohayat
śatruṃjayam meghavegam candraketum suvarcasam
sūryabhāsam ca hatvā etān gāndhārāṇām kṣayam vyadhāt
vidrāvya bhinna sarva aṅgam śakunim kṣataja ukṣitam
śiraḥ phala uccayam cakre rāja cūta vaneṣu saḥ
hema puṅkha iṣu jālena janaka spardhayā iva saḥ
cakāra kaurava anīkam jvalat sva āṇḍava vibhramam

original: sa babhau bimbito rājñāṃ svaṅgeṣu kavaceṣu ca // Bhmj_7.193 //
analyzed: sa babhau bimbitaḥ rājñām su aṅgeṣu kavaceṣu ca
ekaḥ viśva kṣayāya iva prayātaḥ viśva rūpa tām
tam dahantam anekāni dṛṣṭvā śara śata
ācāryam etya rādheyaḥ gāḍha viddhaḥ samabhyadhāt
bālaḥ pi abāla caritaḥ kākutstham avikramaḥ
aśeṣam kṣapayati eṣa sainyam vajrisuta ātmajaḥ
vidhīyatām atra nītiḥ durjayaḥ yam upekṣitaḥ
tvad adhīnāḥ hi yuddhe smin kauravāṇām jaya śriyaḥ
śrutvā etat sa smitaḥ droṇaḥ sūtaputram abhāṣata
satyam hinasti pṛtanām muhur tena arjuna ātmajaḥ

original: asya dhairyamamaryādaṃ dṛṣṭvā prauḍhaṃ ca vikramam // Bhmj_7.198 //
analyzed: asya dhairyam amaryādam dṛṣṭvā prauḍham ca vikramam

original: romāñjakañcukaḥ kāyaḥ kasya nāma na jāyate /
analyzed: romāñja kañcukaḥ kāyaḥ kasya nāma na jāyate
sa kārmukaḥ na śakyaḥ yam sa khaṅga ratha kaṅkaṭaḥ
sa cakraḥ vā raṇe jetum bhāsvaraiḥ tridaśaiḥ api
tat asya kriyatām yatnaḥ sarva āyudha vināśane
para cakra antara sthasya yuṣmābhiḥ yadi śakyate

original: tato droṇaḥ samābhāṣya karṇena sahito yayau // Bhmj_7.201 //
analyzed: tatas droṇaḥ samābhāṣya karṇena sahitaḥ yayau
saubhadram drāvita anīkam saha sarvaiḥ mahā rathaiḥ
sa tān āpatataḥ vīrān maṇḍalīkṛta kārmukaḥ
śaraiḥ cakāra vimukhān nadī vegān iva acalaḥ
tatas ciccheda pārśvena karṇaḥ tasya ānatam dhanuḥ

original: rathaṃ jaghāna hārdikyaḥ sārathiṃ tasya gautamaḥ /
analyzed: ratham jaghāna hārdikyaḥ sārathim tasya gautamaḥ
viratham chinna dhanvānam droṇa mukhyāḥ tam ādravan
sa dīptam su aṅgam ādāya carma ca aneka tārakam
maṇḍalāni caran vīraḥ durlakṣyaḥ samapadyata
carantam vyomni bāhulyāt sahasrāṃśum iva abhitas

original: patitaṃ menire mūrdhni tulyaṃ sarve mahārathāḥ // Bhmj_7.206 //
analyzed: patitam menire mūrdhni tulyam sarve mahā rathāḥ
prahāriṇaḥ kṣurapreṇa droṇaḥ tasya akarot dvidhā
khaṅgam bhinna ibha kumbha agra sakta mauktika danturam
chinna khaṅgaḥ samādāya cakram

original: sa cakre rājacakrāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ cakrāyudhabhramam // Bhmj_7.208 //
analyzed: sa cakre rāja cakrāṇām kṣayam cakra āyudha bhramam
tatas te saṃhatāḥ sarve droṇa mukhyāḥ mahā rathāḥ
tat cakram tilaśas cakruḥ śaraiḥ saṃhāra śaṅkitāḥ
hema aṅgada gadā pāṇiḥ saḥ tha bhīmaḥ iva aparaḥ

original: subalasyātmajaṃ vīraṃ kālikeyaṃ jaghāna saḥ // Bhmj_7.210 //
analyzed: subalasya ātmajam vīram kālikeyam jaghāna saḥ
gāndhāra rāja putrāṇām sa hatvā saptasaptatim
nṛpān brahma vasātīyān gadayā apātayat daśa
niṣpiṣṭa kekaya rathaḥ gaja anīkam cakāra saḥ
vajra pāta vinirbhinna śaila maṇḍala saṃnibham

original: rathaṃ dauḥśāsaneḥ sāśvaṃ sa niṣpiṣya sasārathim /
analyzed: ratham dauḥśāsaneḥ sa aśvam sa niṣpiṣya sa sārathim
gadayā gaja ghātinyā gadā pāṇim tam ādravat
maṇḍalāni carantau tau anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
gadābhyam bhīṣaṇa āghāta jāta vahni kaṇā ākulau
guru prahāra abhihatau petatuḥ tau mahā bhujau
saubhadram patitam dūrāt bāṇaiḥ jaghnuḥ mahā rathāḥ
sāyaka āñcita sarva aṅgam vikīrṇa ākula kuntalam
dauḥśāsaniḥ tam utthāna gadayā mūrdhni atāḍayat
tasmin nipatite vīre vāla cūte iva anilaiḥ
vīta śobham abhūt sarvam jagat udyānam ākulam
praśāntam api tam dṛṣṭvā kṣatra veṇu vana analam
punar uttiṣṭhati iti āsīt bhūbhujām hṛdaya bhramaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā candra vadanam kumāram bhūmi pātitam
vyoma gāḥ mumucuḥ bāṣpam sura vidyādhara aṅganāḥ
bālaḥ śrāntaḥ vihata vāhanaḥ
hataḥ mahā rathaiḥ sarvaiḥ iti abhūt divi niḥśvanaḥ
tatas prahṛṣṭaiḥ kurubhiḥ labdha lakṣyaiḥ samantataḥ
garjadbhiḥ nirjitāḥ senāḥ dudruvuḥ dharmanandanam
tṛtīye dine bhimanyu vadhaḥ
sahasrapattra nayane saubhadre yudhi pātite
śoka ārtaḥ iva raktāṃśuḥ papāta astādri kandarāt
tatas yudhiṣṭhira mukhāḥ saṃmukham hatam āhave
aśocyam śuśucuḥ snehāt jambhāri tanaya ātmajam

original: samāyayau tato jiṣṇuḥ śibiraṃ vimanā iva /
analyzed: samāyayau tatas jiṣṇuḥ śibiram vimanāḥ iva

original: prāyaḥ pūrvaṃ manāṃsyeva kathayanti śubhāśubham // Bhmj_7.224 //
analyzed: prāyas pūrvam manāṃsi eva kathayanti śubha aśubham
sa nijam sainyam ālokya dhvasta chāyam adhomukham
bhrātṝn ca viṣa nārāca nirbhinnān iva marmasu
divasa proṣitam putram draṣṭum utkaṇṭhita āśayaḥ
mūkībhūtān iva śucā tān apṛcchat sa saṃbhramaḥ
kaccit na droṇa vihitam cakra vyūham mama ātmajaḥ

original: praviṣṭo nidhanaṃ nītaḥ kurubhiḥ kūṭayodhibhiḥ // Bhmj_7.227 //
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ nidhanam nītaḥ kurubhiḥ kūṭa yodhibhiḥ

original: praveśaṃ śikṣito vyūhe mayā bālo na nirgamam /
analyzed: praveśam śikṣitaḥ vyūhe mayā bālaḥ na nirgamam

original: dhruvaṃ sa nihataḥ pāpaurvīro rājīvalocanaḥ // Bhmj_7.228 //
analyzed: dhruvam sa nihataḥ pāpaurvīraḥ rājīva locanaḥ
uktvā iti śokadana kvāthyamānaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ
śrutvā tanaya vṛttāntam mohāt sthāṇuḥ iva abhavat

original: yaśomayīṃ praviṣṭo 'sau vīraḥ kalpasthirāṃ tanum // Bhmj_7.229 //
analyzed: yaśaḥ mayīm praviṣṭaḥ sau vīraḥ kalpa sthirām tanum

āruhantaḥ iva ākāśam śakra aśvi vijigīṣayā
atha su alpa avaśeṣe hni tūrṇam saindhava kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
cakampe kaurava camūḥ sāyakaiḥ savyasācinaḥ
vidruteṣu narendreṣu bhagne gaja ghaṭā vane
droṇa anubaddha kavacaḥ kaurava indraḥ samāyayau
vilokya vipula anīkam tam āyāntam mahā ojasam
uvāca kaiṭabhārātiḥ nivāta kavaca antakam

original: ayaṃ sa kartā darpāndho nikārāṇāṃ sthavīyasām /
analyzed: ayam sa kartā darpa andhaḥ nikārāṇām sthavīyasām
prāptaḥ mūlam anarthānām jahi enam kula kaṇṭakam
iti ukte puṣkarākṣeṇa vīrau jiṣṇu suyodhanau
kṣaṇam vilokya cakrāte surendra namuci prabham
preritā kururājena śubhra pakṣā kirīṭinam
krauñca adrim iva haṃsa ālī viveśa viśikha āvalī
gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ bāṇān vandhyān dṛṣṭvā suyodhane
kim etat iti govindaḥ jagāda pṛthu vismayaḥ
dhanaṃjayaḥ tam avadat smita dhauta adhara dyutiḥ

original: jñātaṃ kṛṣṇa mayā yena pāpo 'yaṃ pratibhāṃ śritaḥ // Bhmj_7.343 //
analyzed: jñātam kṛṣṇa mayā yena pāpaḥ yam pratibhām śritaḥ
varma asya guruṇā baddham vidyayā vajra saṃnibham
pratiyogam ca jāne ham kṛtsnam etad vināśane
iti uktvā astram mahat divyam kavaca ucchittaye vyadhāt
tat ca dūrāt mahā astreṇa droṇaputraḥ vyadārayat
dviṣprayojyam na divya astram iti uktvā pāṇḍu nandanaḥ
cakre suyodhanam chinna ratha sārathi kārmukam
hastayoḥ ca śaraiḥ asya cakāra aprāpta varmaṇoḥ
lakṣya abhyāsam iva āsaktam yena asau vimukhaḥ bhavat
tatas drauṇi prabhṛtayaḥ pārtham sarve mahā rathāḥ
abhyādravan su saṃrabdhāḥ vicitra kavaca dhvajāḥ
śikhidhvajaḥ karṇa sutaḥ sīrāṅkaḥ madra bhūpatiḥ
maṇi nāga dhvajaḥ śrīmān svayam rājā suyodhanaḥ
bhūriśravāḥ yūpaketuḥ ante ca vividha dhvajāḥ
hema dīpta āyudha dharāḥ ghoram yuyudhire nṛpāḥ
teṣām āpatatām tūrṇam laghu hastaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: ciccheda bāṇairmarmāṇi chattrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca // Bhmj_7.351 //
analyzed: ciccheda bāṇaiḥ marmāṇi chattrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca
śaraiḥ vivarmaṇām teṣām padma garbha nibhāni saḥ
bāla ātapa aruṇāni iva vapūṃṣi rudhiraiḥ vyadhāt
vadhyamāneṣu vīreṣu jiṣṇunā sarva rājasu
valat su aṅga bhujaḥ kālaḥ nanarta iva nija utsave
atrā antare dharmasutam droṇaḥ vyūha mukhe sthitaḥ
mahā rathaiḥ parivṛtam jighṛkṣuḥ tūrṇam ādravat
sa kṛtvā matsya pāñcāla cedi sṛñjaya kekayān
alpa avaśeṣān rājānam cakāra viratham śaraiḥ

original: hatāśvaṃ kṛttacāpaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sarve yudhiṣṭhiram /
analyzed: hata aśvam kṛtta cāpam ca dṛṣṭvā sarve yudhiṣṭhiram

original: hṛto hṛto nṛpa iti sphāratāraṃ pracukruśuḥ // Bhmj_7.356 //
analyzed: hṛtaḥ hṛtaḥ nṛpaḥ iti sphāra tāram pracukruśuḥ
tatas pāṇḍu sutaḥ śaktim prāhiṇot prāṇa hāriṇīm

original: brahmastreṇa ca tāṃ droṇo bhasmasādakarotkṣaṇāt // Bhmj_7.357 //
analyzed: brahmastreṇa ca tām droṇaḥ bhasmasādakarot kṣaṇāt
chinna sarva āyudhaḥ viddhaḥ śaraiḥ kuliśa dāruṇaiḥ

original: saha devarathenāśu muktvā droṇaṃ yayau nṛpaḥ // Bhmj_7.358 //
analyzed: saha deva rathena āśu muktvā droṇam yayau nṛpaḥ
vidrute dharmatanaye bhāradvājaḥ ruṣā jvalan
dadāha pāṇḍava camūm śara śreṇī śikā śataiḥ
kekayaḥ tha bṛhatkṣatraḥ pāṇḍava anīka nāyakaḥ
droṇa anugam kṣemadhūtim mahīpālam apātayat
traigartam vīra dhanvānam dhṛṣṭaketum mahā ratham

original: vidhāya cchinnamūrdhānaṃ kabandhaṃ vidadhe kṣaṇam // Bhmj_7.361 //
analyzed: vidhāya chinna mūrdhānam kabandham vidadhe kṣaṇam
nirapatyam hāta mitram sahadevaḥ vadhīt yudhi
sātyakiḥ vyāghradattam ca rāja putram apātayat
vidhyamānam balam dṛṣṭvā bhāradvāja sutaḥ paraiḥ
śiraḥ kūṭa avaseṣāṇi pāṇḍu sainyāni akalpayat
rākṣasaḥ baka bhrātā bhīmasenam alambuṣaḥ
yodhayitvā śara śataiḥ tad senām māyayā avadhīt
pravartitām rākṣasena bhīmaḥ dṛṣṭvā asṛj āpagām
tvāṣṭreṇa astreṇa tad māyām chitvā āram ajayat kṛtī
vadhāya bhīmasenasya rakṣaḥ tat punar āgamat
avārayat mahā kāyam mahā kāyaḥ ghaṭotkacaḥ
sa rathāt ratham utsṛjya kālaḥ kālaḥ iva unnadan
ākṛṣya alambuṣam vegāt niṣpiṣya vidadhe vyasum
ghaṭotkacena nihate rākṣase jambha vikrame
bhayam āvirabhūt horam samare sarva bhūbhujām
atrā antare dharmasutaḥ dūra sthasya kirīṭinaḥ
a śṛṇvan śaṅkha nirghoṣam kim api āśaṅkitaḥ bhavat
bhītaḥ bhimanyu vṛkta antāt viṣaṇṇaḥ bhrātṛ vatsalaḥ

original: uvāca sātyakiṃ matvā sa dhuryaṃ sarvadhanvinām // Bhmj_7.370 //
analyzed: uvāca sātyakim matvā sa dhuryam sarva dhanvinām

original: sātyake paśya bandhūnāṃ gurūṇāṃ suhṛdāṃ tathā /
analyzed: sātyake paśya bandhūnām gurūṇām suhṛdām tathā
dos darpasya ca saṃprāptaḥ kālaḥ yam ucitaḥ tava

original: sa te guruḥ sakhā bandhuḥ kirīṭi śatrumadhyagaḥ /
analyzed: sa te guruḥ sakhā bandhuḥ kirīṭi śatru madhya gaḥ

original: na jñāyate praṇaṣṭe 'tra śaṅkhaśabde kathaṃ sthitaḥ // Bhmj_7.372 //
analyzed: na jñāyate praṇaṣṭe śaṅkha śabde katham sthitaḥ
ṛte tvām ujjvala ācāram pravaram śaurya śālinām
bhāraḥ kasmin asahyaḥ yam dhuraṃdhara nidhīyatām
pātre vitaratām pṛthvīm rakṣatām śaraṇa āgatam

original: mittrārthe tyajatāṃ prāṇānsamānaṃ śrūyate phalam // Bhmj_7.374 //
analyzed: mittra arthe tyajatām prāṇān samānam śrūyate phalam

original: dhanyā bhavadvidhā eva kriyate yaiḥ sthiraṃ yaśaḥ /
analyzed: dhanyāḥ bhavadvidhāḥ eva kriyate yaiḥ sthiram yaśaḥ
pavana ākampi kadalī dala ālolaiḥ nija asubhiḥ
tvayi yāta irjunam draṣṭum droṇa grahaṇa jam bhayam

original: bhīmapārṣataguptasya satyaṃ me na bhaviṣyati // Bhmj_7.376 //
analyzed: bhīma pārṣata guptasya satyam me na bhaviṣyati
ukta yudhiṣṭhireṇa iti sātyakiḥ satva sāgaraḥ
sajjaḥ bhavat tathā iti uktvā para anīka bibhitsayā
sa hema kavacaḥ sragvī śubhra aśvam ratham āsthitaḥ
śrīmān ghana nirghoṣa kārmukaḥ
dātā huta analaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ nṛpam āntrya sa anujam

original: bhīme rakṣāṃ nidhāyāsya maṅgalālaṃkṛto yayau // Bhmj_7.379 //
analyzed: bhīme rakṣām nidhāya asya maṅgala alaṃkṛtaḥ yayau
sa bhāradvājam āsādya vainateyaḥ iva āśugaḥ
cakre rāja bhujaṅgānām kṣaṇam ākampa vibhramam
tatas yuddham abhūt horam ācārya yuyudhānayoḥ
mohanam sarva lokānām skanda tārakayoḥ iva
droṇam sa durjayam matvā dhīmān sātyakiḥ abravīt

original: guro śiṣyaṃ tavānveṣṭuṃ phalguṇaṃ prasthitasya me /
analyzed: guro śiṣyam tava anveṣṭum phalguṇam prasthitasya me
asmin alpa avaśeṣe hni na vighnam kartum arhasi
śrutvā etat cāpam ākṛṣya babhāṣe kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ

original: na praveṣṭuṃ tvayā śakyaṃ mayi jīvati sātyake // Bhmj_7.383 //
analyzed: na praveṣṭum tvayā śakyam mayi jīvati sātyake
iti bruvāṇam śaineyaḥ manaḥ māruta raṃhasā

original: rathena vañcayitvā taṃ parāhūtaṃ samāviśat // Bhmj_7.384 //
analyzed: rathena vañcayitvā tam para āhūtam samāviśat
sa vrajan durjayān jitvā kṛtavarma mukhān raṇe
ghorān mlecchān kirātān ca kāmbojān ca nyapātayat
sa anugān pāṇḍu tanayān bhettum vyūha agram udyatān
nirgatya āvārayan sarvān kṛtavarmā dhanuḥ dhanaḥ
javena praviśantam ca sātyakim su bhaṭa aśanim
bhindānam kuñjara ghaṭāḥ rundhānam sāyakaiḥ diśaḥ
śastra vṛṣṭim tad utsṛṣṭām śaraiḥ vikṣipya sātyakiḥ

original: chitvā bhujau jahārāśu saratnamukuṭaṃ śiraḥ // Bhmj_7.390 //
analyzed: chitvā bhujau jahāra āśu sa ratna mukuṭam śiraḥ
tasmin hate sa nāga indraḥ yuyudhāna śara arditaḥ

duryodhana mukhān vīrān ayodhayat asaṃbhramaḥ
parāṅmukhīkṛta aśeṣa su bhaṭaḥ saḥ tha māninaḥ
sudarśanasya nṛpateḥ cakarta ruciram śiraḥ
śabarān yavanān bhojān barbarān tāmraliptikān
śakān muṇḍān kuvindān ca haran dūrāt mataṅga jān
dasyu saṃghān ca vividhān sa hatvā krūra vikramān
cakre karabha kuṭṭākaḥ kṣitam mastiṣka kardamām
duḥśāsanaḥ tha niśitaiḥ viddhaḥ sātyakinā śaraiḥ

original: vihāya samaraṃ tūrṇaṃ bhāradvājāntikaṃ yayau // Bhmj_7.396 //
analyzed: vihāya samaram tūrṇam bhāradvāja antikam yayau

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vihvalaṃ droṇo babhāṣe pārśvartinam /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vihvalam droṇaḥ babhāṣe pārśva artinam

original: ko 'yaṃ te saṃbhramo vīra gatvā rakṣa yajadratham // Bhmj_7.397 //
analyzed: kaḥ yam te saṃbhramaḥ vīra gatvā rakṣa yajat ratham
aho na sātyaki śaraiḥ bhinnām dṛṣṭvā varūthinīm

original: kṛtavairaśca mānī ca yoddhavye vidruto 'si kim // Bhmj_7.398 //
analyzed: kṛta vairaḥ ca mānī ca yoddhavye vidrutaḥ si kim

original: ato bahuguṇaṃ vīrau bhīmapārthau kariṣyataḥ // Bhmj_7.399 //
analyzed: atas bahuguṇam vīrau bhīma pārthau kariṣyataḥ

original: naiṣā sabhā sā pāñcālī yatra tvaṃ kṛṣṭavānasi /
analyzed: na eṣā sabhā sā pāñcālī yatra tvam kṛṣṭavān asi
imāḥ prāṇa paṇa prāpyāḥ yaśaḥ vikrama bhūmayaḥ
adyā api rocatām saṃdhiḥ yuṣmākam pāṇḍu nandanaiḥ

original: antaṃ na yātā vīrāṇāṃ saṃpratyarjunasāyakāḥ // Bhmj_7.401 //
analyzed: antam na yātāḥ vīrāṇām saṃprati arjuna sāyakāḥ
yudhyasva tūrṇam athavā śātravaiḥ a parāṅmukhaḥ
bhagna pradhānā hi camūḥ vāryamāṇā api dīryate
iti rukmarathena uktaḥ vailabhyāt kṣmām vilokayan
nighnan sāhāyyakam cakre mṛtyoḥ iva jagat kṣate
vīraketum sudhanvānam citraketum ca pārthivam
tathā citrartham vīram pāñcālān avadhīt yudhi
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ tatas kruddhaḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhedibhiḥ
viddhvā droṇam asaṃbhrāntaḥ śaraiḥ senām adārayat
ācāryam bhṛśam ākīrṇam śaraiḥ mūrchām upāgatam
khaḍga pāṇiḥ abhidrāvya pārṣataḥ hantum udyayau
labdha saṃjñaḥ tatas droṇaḥ śaraiḥ āsanna pātibhiḥ
kiṣku pramāṇaiḥ vaitastaiḥ vaṃśa utthaiḥ tam apūrayat
vṛścikaiḥ iva taiḥ vyāptaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ
prayayau guruṇā paścāt dāritaḥ pṛthu sāyakaiḥ
tatas śoṇa hayaḥ kruddhaḥ pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm
dārayan bhūmipālānām śirobhiḥ kṣmām apūrayat

original: tasya tūrṇaṃ śitairbāṇairguruḥ kṛtvā yudhi kṣayam /

kekaya dhṛṣṭaketu vadhaḥ

droṇaḥ jaghāna pāñcālān hehayān iva bhārgavaḥ
bhagnāsu pāṇḍu senāsu ghore tasmin mahā āhave
nininda krūra varmāṇam ācāryam vyathitaḥ janaḥ

cira praviṣṭe śeneye śaṅkitaḥ dharmajaḥ punar

original: yathā na śrūyate bhīma śaṅkhaśabdaḥ kirīṭinaḥ /

original: tathā manye kimapyasya kṛtaṃ sarvairmahārathaiḥ // Bhmj_7.418 //
analyzed: tathā manye kim api asya kṛtam sarvaiḥ mahā rathaiḥ

original: vinā tavānujaṃ bhīma kathaṃ jīvitumutsahe // Bhmj_7.419 //
analyzed: vinā tava anujam bhīma katham jīvitum utsahe

original: rājandhanaṃjaye śaṅkāṃ na mithyā kartumarhasi // Bhmj_7.422 //

original: yathā tvaṃ manyase droṇa nedānīṃ no gururbhavān // Bhmj_7.429 //
analyzed: yathā tvam manyase droṇa na idānīm naḥ guruḥ bhavān
pūjayati arjunaḥ mānyān bhīmaḥ ham paśya mām iti
iti uktvā prāhiṇot tasmai gadām aśani gauravām

original: apakrānte kṣaṇaṃ droṇe sānujaṃ kauraveśvaram // Bhmj_7.431 //
analyzed: apakrānte kṣaṇam droṇe sa anujam kaurava īśvaram

original: vidrutaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ dromaḥ punarādravat // Bhmj_7.434 //
analyzed: vidrutam sva balam dṛṣṭvā tam dromaḥ punar ādravat
