mandara uddhūta dugdha abdhi ghoṣau saṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ
tena diś taṭa saṃghaṭṭa paṭṭa ṭāṅkāra śālinā
śabdena sādhvasa kṛtā bhuvanāni cakampire
ākarṇya kṛṣṇayoḥ tulyam śaṅkha nādam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
hṛṣṭaḥ mene samuttīrṇam arjunam ripu sāgarāt

original: bhajyamānaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmena bhujaśālinā // Bhmj_7.445 //
analyzed: bhajyamānam balam dṛṣṭvā bhīmena bhuja śālinā
kopāt abhyāyayau karṇaḥ kurvan bāṇa mayam jagat
tam āyāntam śaraiḥ viddhvā nadat pavana nandanaḥ
cakāra vimukham kṛtta dhvaja syandana kārmukam

original: bhagne samiti rādheye dhaureye dhairyaśālinām // Bhmj_7.447 //
analyzed: bhagne samiti rādheye dhaureye dhairya śālinām
uvāca droṇam āgatya mlāna mānaḥ suyodhanaḥ

original: arjunaste priyaḥ śiṣyastvāmullaṅghya gato yadi // Bhmj_7.448 //
analyzed: arjunaḥ te priyaḥ śiṣyaḥ tvām ullaṅghya gataḥ yadi
tat kim praviṣṭau prasabham yuyudhāna vṛkodarau
kim anyat vidhi vaimukhyam satyam asmāsu jṛmbhate
yatra velām atikrāntaḥ bhavān vīrya mahā udadhiḥ
iti uktaḥ kururājena babhāṣe kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ

original: sainyaṃ puraśca paścācca gṛhītaṃ dhāryate katham /
analyzed: sainyam puras ca paścāt ca gṛhītam dhāryate katham
rakṣyamāṇam itas yatnāt puratas pravidīryate
a vāritāḥ viśanti eva sarve pāñcāla sṛñjayāḥ
sainya dvāram itas yatnāt rakṣyam sarva ātmanā mayā
bhavān karṇa mukhaiḥ sārdham ebhiḥ sarvaiḥ mahā rathaiḥ

original: pārthasātyakibhīmānāṃ paryāptaḥ kiṃ na vāraṇe // Bhmj_7.453 //
analyzed: pārtha sātyaki bhīmānām paryāptaḥ kim na vāraṇe
asmin muhūrta śeṣe hni gatvā rakṣa jayadratham
adhunā tad paṇau eva raṇa dyūte jaya ajayau
iti uktaḥ guruṇā rājā gatvā pāñcāla nandanau
sarvaiḥ cakāra virathau cakrarakṣau kirīṭinaḥ
atrā antare punar karṇaḥ samāgatya vṛkodaram
hemu puṅkhaiḥ śaraiḥ cakre jvalita anala saṃnibham
tatas bhīma bhuja utsṛṣṭaiḥ pattribhiḥ giri bhedibhiḥ
viddhaḥ chinna āyudha rathaḥ raṇam tatyāja sūtajaḥ
tatas bhagne kuru bale nadantam vāyu nandanam

original: karṇo mānī samāśvasya rathena punarādravat // Bhmj_7.458 //
analyzed: karṇaḥ mānī samāśvasya rathena punar ādravat
ghore pravṛtte samare su ciram karṇa bhīmayoḥ
babhūva viśikha vrātaiḥ nara nāga ratha kṣayaḥ
bhīmaḥ tha sūtaputrasya chitvā tāla upamam dhanuḥ

original: jaghāna ghananirghoṣaṃ rathaṃ saha manorathaiḥ // Bhmj_7.460 //
analyzed: jaghāna ghana nirghoṣam ratham saha manorathaiḥ
viratham karṇam ālokya yudhyamānam prayatnataḥ
ādiṣṭaḥ kururājena durjayaḥ tam upādravat
duryodhana anujam vīram āyāntam śara varṣiṇam

original: taṃ hatvā vinadanbhīmaḥ śaraiḥ karṇamapūrayat // Bhmj_7.462 //
analyzed: tam hatvā vinadan bhīmaḥ śaraiḥ karṇam apūrayat
punar syandanam āsthāya sūtapūtraḥ vṛkodaram
abhyadhāvat pṛthu śara jvālā jaṭila kārmukam
tad bāṇa dārita tanuḥ pāvaniḥ kopa kampitaḥ

original: gurvī gadāṃ visṛjyāsya niṣpipeṣa rathaṃ javāt // Bhmj_7.464 //
analyzed: gurvī gadām visṛjya asya niṣpipeṣa ratham javāt

original: bhuvi sthitaṃ śarairbhinnaṃ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā suyodhanaḥ /
analyzed: bhuvi sthitam śaraiḥ bhinnam karṇam dṛṣṭvā suyodhanaḥ
ādideśa anujam kopāt durmukham karṇa guptaye
vegāt kauravam āyāntam tam śastra aśani duḥsaham
rathāt apātayat bhīmaḥ nirbhinna hṛdayam śaraiḥ
āruhya durmukha ratham karṇaḥ duḥkha anala ākulaḥ
bhīmāya prāhiṇot bāṇān jvalitān iva duḥsahān
tatas bhīma bhuja utsṛṣṭāḥ sa niḥśvāsāḥ iva uragāḥ
aṅgarājam vinirbhidya śarāḥ pātālam āviśan
sa gāḍha viddhaḥ dudrāva java vyālola ketunā
rathena kuru senānām dhṛtim unmūlayan iva
abhyadhāvan tatas bhīmam pañca duryodhana anujāḥ
jagaduḥ śalya durgrāhyāḥ sa durdarśana duṣprabhāḥ
yudhyamānān sa tān bāṇaiḥ mahārha ābharaṇa ujjvalān
apātayat mahā vātaḥ iva sa indrāyudhān ghanān

original: hateṣu teṣu rādheyo dhunāno vipulaṃ dhanuḥ /
analyzed: hateṣu teṣu rādheyaḥ dhunānaḥ vipulam dhanuḥ
ayodhayat punar bhīmam mahā kāle pi asaṃbhramaḥ

original: tasya bhīmo dhanuśchitvā rathaṃ ca guruvikramaḥ /
analyzed: tasya bhīmaḥ dhanuḥ chitvā ratham ca guru vikramaḥ
nardan karebhyaḥ vīrāṇām āyudhāni nyapātayat
viṣame vartamānasya rādheyasya suyodhanaḥ
sapta anujān sahāya artham preṣayāmāsa sa tvaram
citrākṣaḥ citravarmā ca citrabāṇaḥ śarāsanaḥ

original: upacitraḥ sacitraśca cārucitraśca te samam // Bhmj_7.475 //
analyzed: upacitraḥ sacitraḥ ca cārucitraḥ ca te samam
āyāntaḥ eva vimukhāḥ tulya ābharaṇa vāsasaḥ
śaraiḥ bharmi bhuja utsṛṣṭaiḥ pretāḥ petuḥ mahī tale
tān vīkṣya patitān vīrān kṣīṇa puṇyān iva grahān
karṇo sru pūrṇa nayanaḥ ratham anyam samādade
krodhāt adhika saṃrambaḥ yudhyamānaḥ vṛkodaraḥ
tam nirvikāraḥ viśikhaiḥ vajra vegaiḥ apūrayat
karṇam ācchāditam dṛṣṭvā bhīma cāpa cyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
vyādideśa anujān sapta tad guptyai kaurava īśvaraḥ
citrāyudhaḥ śatrusahaḥ śatruḥ śatruṃjayaḥ tathā
citrāsuḥ citrasenaḥ ca vikeśaḥ ca iti tān drutam
vīrān abhimukhān bāṇa viddhān pavana nandanaḥ
unmamātha rata agrebhyaḥ śailebhyaḥ pādapān iva
hateṣu rāja putreṣu teṣu vikrama śāliṣu
bhīma karṇa śaraiḥ kṣipram babhūva jana saṃkṣayaḥ
bhīma bāṇa vinirbhinnaḥ saṃstambhya ādhirathiḥ vyathām
maṇḍalīkṛta kodaṇḍaḥ cakre bāṇa mayam nabhaḥ
tatas karṇa śarāḥ cakruḥ vyaśva sūta dhanuḥ dhvajam
ekībhūtāḥ iva javāt bhīmam vismaya kāriṇaḥ
sarva āyudhāni saṃrabdhaḥ virathasya upasarpataḥ
vaikartanaḥ cakarta asya saṃvartakaḥ iva unnadan
kṣīṇa āyudhaḥ dviradān hayān ca pavanātmajaḥ
prāhiṇot sūtaputrāya śaraiḥ ciccheda tān ca saḥ

original: viṣamasthaṃ raṇe karṇo na jaghāna vṛkodaram /
analyzed: viṣama stham raṇe karṇaḥ na jaghāna vṛkodaram

original: vīraḥ kuntīvacaḥ smṛtvā satyaśīlā hi sādhavaḥ // Bhmj_7.487 //
analyzed: vīraḥ kuntī vacaḥ smṛtvā satya śīlāḥ hi sādhavaḥ
tam spṛśan iva cāpena provāca vinadan nṛpaḥ
mahadbhiḥ mūḍham ā yuddham akṛtāstraḥ punar kṛthāḥ
haṃho bahu bhujaḥ nā iyam ucitā tava yuddha bhūḥ
māṃsa astikūṭa kuṭṭāka sūdaśālāsu śobhase
athavā bhāra yogyasya śarīrasya asya te paśoḥ
yuktāḥ tūvarakāḥ sphītāḥ kānane labdha vṛttayaḥ
iti bruvāṇe rādheye bhīmam kṛcchra daśā āśritam
vilokya dūrāt kaṃsāriḥ phlaguṇāya nyavedayat
tatas muhūrta gaṇane hema rekhā anukāriṇī
tūrṇam bāṇa āvalī karṇam gāṇḍīva patitā āviśat
khāṇḍava anala saṃkrānta śikhayā iva bhṛtaḥ bhṛśam
vyāptaḥ dudrāva rādheyaḥ jaya uddhūta dhvaja aṃśukaḥ
bhīmasena praveśaḥ
ārūḍhe sātyaki ratham kopa tapte vṛkodare
karṇāya prāhiṇot pārthaḥ nārācam vyoma vartmanā
vajra tulyam tam āyāntam dāruṇam sarva bhūbhujām
dūrāt alakṣitaḥ drauṇiḥ ciccheda āśu patatribhiḥ
atha arjunaḥ bāṇa śataiḥ dreṇa ātmajam apūrayat
saḥ pi tad sāyakaiḥ bhinnaḥ senā saṃgaram āviśat
tatas kanaka pṛṣṭhānām śarāṇām dhanuṣām tathā
raśmibhiḥ kopa racanā raṭantam iva rājakam
vidārayan āsasāda sūci vyūham dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: āste mahārathairgupto yatra pāpo jayadrathaḥ // Bhmj_7.498 //
analyzed: āste mahā rathaiḥ guptaḥ yatra pāpaḥ jayadrathaḥ
atrā antare śara jvālīn akṣitipa kānanam
alambiṣaḥ ghana dhvānaḥ garjan sātyakim ādravat
tam rāja varam āyāntam pūrayantam śaraiḥ diśaḥ
avārayat mahā anīkam sātyakiḥ satya pauruṣaḥ
tayoḥ kāñcana puṅkhābhiḥ śara mālābhiḥ āvṛtāḥ

original: siktā vīraraseneva diśaḥ pallavitā babhuḥ // Bhmj_7.501 //
analyzed: siktāḥ vīra rasena iva diśaḥ pallavitāḥ babhuḥ
tatas cakarta bhallena śiraḥ tasya āśu sātyakiḥ
mauli śoṇa maṇi chāyā ācchuritena samāharan
nihatya alambupam vīram pravarāṇām prahāriṇām
śatāni rāja putrāṇām nyavadhīt pañca sātyakiḥ
kṣapayantam kuru camūm tam raṇe dīpta vikramam
abhyadhāvat vīra ketuḥ vīraḥ bhūriśravāḥ svayam
tayoḥ vicitra dhanuṣoḥ śara durdina meghayoḥ

original: garjitaṃ cakitāḥ sarve rājahaṃsā na sehire // Bhmj_7.505 //
analyzed: garjitam cakitāḥ sarve rājahaṃsāḥ na sehire
tau mithas śara saṃpāta nirgharṣaṇa samutthitaiḥ
virejatuḥ sphuliṅga oghaiḥ kīṭa ratnauḥ iva acalau

original: chitvā parasparaṃ cāpaṃ syandanaṃ saṃpramathya ca /
analyzed: chitvā parasparam cāpam syandanam saṃpramathya ca

original: khaṅgacarmadharau vīrau yuyudhāte cirāya tau // Bhmj_7.507 //
analyzed: khaṅga carma dharau vīrau yuyudhāte cirāya tau
javāt alakṣya vapuṣoḥ citra maṇḍala cāriṇoḥ

original: tayoḥ sthagitasaṃgrāmā vīrāḥ prekṣakatāṃ yayuḥ // Bhmj_7.508 //
analyzed: tayoḥ sthagita saṃgrāmāḥ vīrāḥ prekṣaka tām yayuḥ
tatas sātyakim ākṛṣya mālyavadbhiḥ śiroruhaiḥ
hatvā vakṣasi pādena saumadattiḥ apātayat
khaḍgena sātyaki śiraḥ chettum dṛṣṭvā tam udyatam

original: uvāca sahasā pārthaṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ kaiṭabhāntakaḥ // Bhmj_7.510 //
analyzed: uvāca sahasā pārtham saṃbhrāntaḥ kaiṭabhāntakaḥ
preṣitam dharmarājena tvad artham vṛṣṇi puṃgavam

original: paśya śatruvaśaṃ yātaṃ śrāntaṃ sātyakimāhave // Bhmj_7.511 //
analyzed: paśya śatru vaśam yātam śrāntam sātyakim āhave
anityau sarvathā nūnam su bhaṭānām jaya ajayau

original: yadimāṃ sātyakirapi prāptaḥ klībocitāṃ daśām // Bhmj_7.512 //
analyzed: yat imām sātyakiḥ api prāptaḥ klība ucitām daśām
eṣa bhūriśravāḥ tūrṇam khaḍgena akhaṇḍa vikramaḥ

original: samudyataḥ śiro hartuṃ śiṣyasya tava sātyakeḥ // Bhmj_7.513 //
analyzed: samudyataḥ śiraḥ hartum śiṣyasya tava sātyakeḥ
ukte janārdanena iti prahāra abhimukham bhujam
bhallena bhūriśravasaḥ jahāra kapiketanaḥ
kṛtte dūrāt adṛśyena bhuja stambhe kirīṭinā
kāla vaktrāt nipatitam sātyakim menire janāḥ
patan sa bhuvi dordaṇḍaḥ kaṅkaṇa āvali niḥsvanaḥ
ninādaiḥ iva kaunteyam tāra tāraiḥ atarjayat
tasmin jaya dvipa ālāne viśrānti sadane kṣiteḥ
pratāpa mandira stambhe bhuje bhuvi nipātite
tyaktvā vāma kara ākṛṣṭām sātyakeḥ mūrdhaja āvalīm
uvāca analpa saṃkalpaḥ yūpaketuḥ dhanaṃjayam

original: aho vīravrataṃ pārtha kīdṛśaṃ darśinaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: aho vīra vratam pārtha kīdṛśam darśinam tvayā

original: yenānyaraṇasaktasya cchadmanā me hato bhujaḥ // Bhmj_7.519 //
analyzed: yena anya raṇa saktasya chadmanā me hataḥ bhujaḥ
ucitam vā tava evā etat mantrī yasya janārdanaḥ
jātā hṛdya artha lobhena kūṭa yuddha vigdha tā
iti uktvā vāma hastena śara śayyām vidhāya saḥ
upaviśya viśan antar sahitaḥ sva ṛśa vṛttibhiḥ
hutvā prāṇa analam bāṇaiḥ bhru madhye nihita īkṣaṇaḥ
tejaḥ pravidadhe mūrdhni śaśi sūrya anala uttaram
tatas bībhatsuḥ avadat nindā mukharitān nṛpān

original: vihvalo viṣamātmā ca rakṣitaḥ sātyakirmayā // Bhmj_7.523 //
analyzed: vihvalaḥ viṣama ātmā ca rakṣitaḥ sātyakiḥ mayā

original: hantā śiṣyasya sakhyuśca kṛttahastaḥ kṛto yadi /
analyzed: hantā śiṣyasya sakhyuḥ ca kṛtta hastaḥ kṛtaḥ yadi

original: tatra kiṃ nāma manyadhvaṃ nirdeṣā yūyamāhave // Bhmj_7.524 //
analyzed: tatra kim nāma manyadhvam nirdeṣāḥ yūyam āhave
ekaḥ bhimanyuḥ nihataḥ sa māyaiḥ sarva pārthivaiḥ
śrāntaḥ chinna dhanuḥ khaḍgaḥ tat kim nāma vadanti naḥ
iti uktavati kaunteye labdha saṃjñaḥ sātyakiḥ

original: yayāce praṇataḥ pūrvaṃ raṇaṃ prāyajuṣo ripoḥ // Bhmj_7.526 //
analyzed: yayāce praṇataḥ pūrvam raṇam prāya juṣaḥ ripoḥ
khaḍgena yajña śīlasya vīrasya yaśasām nidheḥ
vaktram muktā āvalī bhābhiḥ jāta hāsam iva aharat
sa kṛṣṇena ca bhūpālaiḥ vāryamāṇena saṃbhramāt
krodhāt ajñāta vṛttena tasmin sātyakinā hate
dhik śabdaḥ sarva vīrāṇām uttasthau sthagita ambaraḥ

original: saumadatteśca caritaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ surā divi // Bhmj_7.529 //
analyzed: saumadatteḥ ca caritam praśaśaṃsuḥ surāḥ divi
bhūriśravasaḥ vadhaḥ
sa tena nirjitaḥ pūrvam somadattaḥ ti manyunā

original: ārādhya tapasā devaṃ rūdraṃ tripuradāraṇam // Bhmj_7.530 //
analyzed: ārādhya tapasā devam rūdram tripura dāraṇam
lebhe sātyaki jetāram bhūriśravasam ātmajam
śekharam sarva vīrāṇām vadānyam bahu yājinam
tasmin nipatite vīre jayadratha vadha utsukaḥ

original: tūrṇaṃ viveśa śvetāśvo nibiḍaṃ rājamaṇḍalam // Bhmj_7.532 //
analyzed: tūrṇam viveśa śvetāśvaḥ nibiḍam rāja maṇḍalam
asta adri cūḍāmaṇi tām gantum icchati bhāskare

original: dadarśa saindhavaṃ pārtho guptaṃ sarvairmahārathaiḥ // Bhmj_7.533 //
analyzed: dadarśa saindhavam pārthaḥ guptam sarvaiḥ mahā rathaiḥ
ākarṇa āñcita gāṇḍīvaḥ tam dūrāt duḥsaha āgamam
dṛśā eva kopa aruṇayā tasya dāham iva akarot
tatas vilulite sainye parāvṛtte iva ambudhau

original: hato hataḥ sindhurājo babhūveti mahāsvanaḥ // Bhmj_7.535 //
analyzed: hataḥ hataḥ sindhurājaḥ babhūva iti mahā svanaḥ
atha karṇa kṛpa drauṇi duḥśāsana suyodhanāḥ
saha sarvaiḥ mahīpālaiḥ dhanaṃjayam ayodhayat
tān vidhāya śaraiḥ tūrṇam dvasta varma ratha dhvajān
pātayan rāja vaktrāṇi jiṣṇuḥ saindhavam ādravat
jayadrathaḥ pi vijayam vilokya acyuta sārathim
sa niṣkṛṣya asakṛt taiḥ taiḥ sāyakaiḥ tam apūrayat
tatas bravīt madhuripuḥ dina ante savyasācinam

original: chindhi sindhupateḥ kṣipraṃ śiro divyena patriṇā // Bhmj_7.539 //
analyzed: chinddhi sindhupateḥ kṣipram śiraḥ divyena patriṇā
vṛddhakṣattraḥ pitā prādāt varam asya kṣitau śiraḥ
pātayiṣyati yaḥ tulyam tasya api nipatiṣyati
samantapañcaka abhyarṇe pitā asya tapasi sthitaḥ

original: tadaṅke pātaya ripoḥ sirastasmātprayātu gām // Bhmj_7.541 //
analyzed: tad aṅke pātaya ripoḥ siraḥ tasmāt prayātu gām
iti ukte śauriṇā jiṣṇuḥ chittvā sindhu śiraḥ javāt
śareṇa saṃdhyā dhyāna stha janaka aṅke nyapātayat
aṅkāt ajñāsa vṛttasya kṣipataḥ tat śiraḥ kṣitau

original: vṛddhakṣattrasya sahasā papātāgre nijaṃ śiraḥ // Bhmj_7.543 //
analyzed: vṛddhakṣattrasya sahasā papāta agre nijam śiraḥ
tasmin nipatite vīre trailokya āścarya kāriṇā
gāṇḍīvadhanvanā kṛṣṇaḥ nanāda āsphoṭayan diśaḥ
tatas vighaṭite vyūhe kuru rāja varūthinī
nauḥ iva abdheḥ mahā vātaiḥ babhrāma āvarta nartitā

original: bhīmo nanarda taṃ nādaṃ hataṃ matvā jayadratham /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ nanarda tam nādam hatam matvā jayadratham
prahṛṣṭaḥ pratijagrāha nānā vādyam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: akṣauhiṇīḥ sapta hatvā hataḥ pārthena saindhavaḥ /
analyzed: akṣauhiṇīḥ sapta hatvā hataḥ pārthena saindhavaḥ

original: nūnaṃ na durgaṃ daivasya kiṃcidityūcire janāḥ // Bhmj_7.547 //
analyzed: nūnam na durgam daivasya kiṃcid iti ūcire janāḥ
nirvibhāge tatas yuddhe pravṛtte nṛpati kṣaye

original: droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ ca vidadhe śarairjiṣṇuḥ parāṅmukham // Bhmj_7.548 //
analyzed: droṇam kṛpam ca vidadhe śaraiḥ jiṣṇuḥ parāṅmukham
bhīma sāyaka nirbhinna jihvā karṇam
ca sātyakiḥ

original: āruroha rathaṃ vīro vitīrṇa hariṇā nijam // Bhmj_7.549 //
analyzed: āruroha ratham vīraḥ vitīrṇa hariṇā nijam
māruteḥ avamānam ca kalayan śatamanyu jaḥ

original: punaḥ pratijñāṃ karṇasya vṛṣasenavadhe vyadhāt // Bhmj_7.550 //
analyzed: punar pratijñām karṇasya vṛṣasena vadhe vyadhāt

original: tato yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prāpya tau ca sātyakiphalguṇau /
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiram prāpya tau ca sātyaki phalguṇau
mithas śaśaṃsuḥ pramadāt abhinandya parākramam
kṛṣṇau atha pariṣvajya mā ānandam dharmanandanaḥ

original: tuṣṭāva jagatāṃ nāthaṃ viṣṇuṃ vijayakāraṇam // Bhmj_7.552 //
analyzed: tuṣṭāva jagatām nātham viṣṇum vijaya kāraṇam
bāṣpa ākulaḥ tatas rājā droṇam etya suyodhanaḥ

original: ūce tvayā kṛtāśvāso nihataḥ sa jayadrathaḥ // Bhmj_7.553 //
analyzed: ūce tvayā kṛta āśvāsaḥ nihataḥ sa jayadrathaḥ
śrutvā etat avadat droṇaḥ nidhanāya eva dīkṣitaḥ

original: tyakṣyāmi kavacaṃ rājannāhatvā tava vairiṇaḥ // Bhmj_7.554 //
analyzed: tyakṣyāmi kavacam rājan na a hatvā tava vairiṇaḥ
ācāryeṇa iti abhihite sarve duryodhana anugāḥ
prāṇa havye raṇa makhe tasthuḥ ābaddha niścayāḥ
atha aṃśumati yāte stam dinakṛt kamala tviṣi
śoṇa chatre iva ākṛṣṭe saṃdhyā rakta sarit plavaiḥ
nakṣatraiḥ tāra taralaiḥ kopa kampa juṣām raṇe

original: hatānāṃ bhūbhunāṃ jīvairiva vyāpte nabhastale // Bhmj_7.557 //
analyzed: hatānām bhūbhunām jīvaiḥ iva vyāpte nabhastale
tamobhiḥ āvṛte vyomni kṛpāṇa vanameckaiḥ
divya astra dagdhaiḥ mātaṅgaiḥ iva tridiva gāmibhiḥ
visphurat mauli keyūra hema sāyaka kārmukāḥ

original: cakrire samaraṃ ghoraṃ duryodhanamukhāḥ paraiḥ // Bhmj_7.559 //
analyzed: cakrire samaram ghoram duryodhana mukhāḥ paraiḥ
arjuna dhvāna garjābhiḥ siṃhanādaiḥ ca māruteḥ
droṇa kārmuka nirghoṣaiḥ pṛthivī samakampata
a śrāntam yudhyamānānām kuru pāṇḍava bhūbhujām
babhau sākṣāt iva āyātā kālarātriḥ vibhāvarī
prāpuḥ tamāṃsi vaipulyam khaḍgeṣu dviradeṣu ca

original: prāpustamāṃsi dāridryaṃ chattreṣu vyajaneṣu ca // Bhmj_7.562 //
analyzed: prāpuḥ tamāṃsi dāridryam chattreṣu vyajaneṣu ca
gṛdhra bhūta utsave tasmin vikarālā vasuṃdharā
a vartamāna mānena tamasā iva vidāritā
śira astra kaṅkaṭa āpāti śastra jvālā jaṭāḥ babhuḥ
tamaḥ piśāca saṃghānām piṅgāḥ śmaśru saṭāḥ iva
tatra droṇaḥ mahā astra oghaiḥ kṣapayan rāja maṇḍalam
ādīpta ratna mukuṭam proccakarta śineḥ śiraḥ
bhīmasenaḥ pi kāliṅgam rāja putram tarasvinam
rathāt ratham abhiplutya nijaghāna āśu muṣṭinā
tasya muṣṭi hatasya ājau petuḥ asthīni bhū tale
phalgunī aśma hatasya iva cira pakvasya śākhinaḥ
kaliṅga kula saṃhāram kṛtvā tūrṇam vṛkodaraḥ

original: dhruvaṃ ca jaladhāraṃ ca rājaputrāvadārayat // Bhmj_7.569 //
analyzed: dhruvam ca jaladhāram ca rāja putrau adārayat
vidhāya vimukham karṇam bhīmaḥ duryodhana anujam

original: niṣpipeṣa padā hatvā vīro duṣkaradurmadaḥ // Bhmj_7.570 //
analyzed: niṣpipeṣa padā hatvā vīraḥ duṣkara durmadaḥ
somadattasya tanayam śalam hatvā atha sātyakiḥ

original: taṃ putraśokavidhuraṃ cakāra vimukhaṃ śaraiḥ // Bhmj_7.571 //
analyzed: tam putra śoka vidhuram cakāra vimukham śaraiḥ
dārayantam kuru camūm sātyakim śara varṣiṇam
diśaḥ saṃpūrayan bāṇaiḥ aśvatthāmā samādravat
kṣapayantam anīkāni dṛṣṭvā rudram iva aparam
niśīthe dviguṇa utsāhaḥ tam adhāvat haṭotkacaḥ
tasya nādena mahatā diśaḥ samabhipūritāḥ
sphuṭitāḥ yatra dalaśas tat āścaryam iva abhavat
aśvatthāmni prabhā dhāmni bāṇa ugra kiraṇe raṇe
kurvan ghaṭotkacaḥ reje rāhu jṛmbhā vijṛmbhitam
śarāṇām drauṇi muktānām divyānām samare rucaḥ

original: na kūṇitāni netrāṇi rātrau bhūtāni sehire // Bhmj_7.576 //
analyzed: na kūṇitāni netrāṇi rātrau bhūtāni sehire
akṣauhiṇīm rākṣasānām haiḍamba vaśavartinām
taṭa āyudhāni dalayan ekaḥ drauṇiḥ ayodhayat
chittvā ghaṭotkaṭaḥ hṛṣṭam cakram kāla anala prabham
jaghāna añjanaparvāṇam tad putram ghora vikramam

original: tato vimohanīṃ māyāṃ drauṇiḥ kruddhasya rakṣasaḥ /
analyzed: tatas vimohanīm māyām drauṇiḥ kruddhasya rakṣasaḥ
chittvā jaghāna visikhaiḥ dhṛmnā anujān raṇe
kuntibhoja sutān hatvā sahasrāṇi prahāriṇām

original: jaghāna rājaputrāṇāṃ drauṇiḥ kāla ivākulaḥ // Bhmj_7.580 //
analyzed: jaghāna rāja putrāṇām drauṇiḥ kālaḥ iva ākulaḥ
atrā antare bhīmasenaḥ bāhlika adhipateḥ śiraḥ
gadayā vīra ghātinyā niṣpipeṣa āśu maulinaḥ
tatas jaghāna saṃrabdhān daśa duryodhana anujān
vīrabāhum dṛḍharatham nāgadanta mayobhujam
pramāthinam virajasam suhastam sudṛḍham tathā
hatvā etān sapta gāndhārān avadhīt subala ātmajān
nighnantam kaurava camūm svayam yudhi yudhiṣṭhiram
aindra vāruṇa vāyavyaiḥ astraiḥ dreṇo pyayodhayat
tatas prayuktam brahmāstram guruṇā tad jihīrṣayā
avārayat asaṃrambhaḥ brahmāstreṇa eva dharmajaḥ
sa anugaiḥ pāṇḍu tanayaiḥ gajaiḥ iva sarojinīm

original: mṛdyamānāṃ camūṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇamūce suyodhanaḥ // Bhmj_7.586 //
analyzed: mṛdyamānām camūm dṛṣṭvā karṇam ūce suyodhanaḥ
karṇa ākarṇaya saṃgrāme jayibhiḥ pāṇḍu sūnubhiḥ

original: virāvaṃ vadhyamānānāṃ sainyānāṃ ca tarasvinām // Bhmj_7.587 //
analyzed: virāvam vadhyamānānām sainyānām ca tarasvinām
tumule smin nirāloke viṣame samupasthite
tejasām āśrayaḥ śūra tvam eva ekaḥ parāyaṇam
praṇayāt iti rādheyaḥ bhūbhujā svayam arthitaḥ
uvāca pāṇḍu senāsu kṣipan iva śara valīḥ
vīra śayyā sthite bhīṣme śekhare sarva dhanvinām
rājan bhāraḥ krama āyātaḥ mama eva ayam kim ucyate
adya vīra vrata haram harasya api kirīṭinam
pātayāmi eṣa samare śaktyā vāsava dattayā
iti ukte sūtaputreṇa provāca prahasan kṛpaḥ
loke sūtyam avīre smin ekaḥ tvam vīra tām gataḥ

original: aho nu mithyā rādheya kathitena tāvamunā /
analyzed: aho nu mithyā rādheya kathitena tau amunā
satatam sarva vīrāṇām śravaṇau badhirīkṛtau
kutas tvam a śruta udantaḥ iva āyātaḥ parākramī

original: yadā hataḥ sindhupatiḥ kṛtavānna bhavāṃstadā // Bhmj_7.594 //
analyzed: yadā hataḥ sindhupatiḥ kṛtavān na bhavān tadā

original: dṛṣṭasārā vayaṃ sarve tava pāṇḍusutasya ca /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa sārāḥ vayam sarve tava pāṇḍu sutasya ca

original: balānusāraṃ yudhyasva vṛthā ślāghāṃ tu mā kṛtāḥ // Bhmj_7.595 //
analyzed: bala anusāram yudhyasva vṛthā ślāghām tu mā kṛtāḥ
iti śāradvatena ukte kopāt vaikartanaḥ bravīt

original: garjanti saphalaṃ vīrāḥ prāvṛṣeṇyā ivāmbudāḥ // Bhmj_7.596 //
analyzed: garjanti sa phalam vīrāḥ prāvṛṣeṇyāḥ iva ambudāḥ

original: tvaṃ tu vṛddha nirācāro mohādevaṃ prabhāṣase /
analyzed: tvam tu vṛddha nirācāraḥ mohāt evam prabhāṣase
anya pakṣa āśrayaḥ kaḥ hi bandī iva anyān praśaṃsati
brahmabandho punar dveṣāt yadi evam abhidhāsyati

original: chetasyāmi jihvāṃ kaṭukāṃ tadanenāsinā tava // Bhmj_7.598 //
analyzed: chetasyāmi jihvām kaṭukām tat anena asinā tava
iti karṇena saṃrambhāt kopitam vīkṣya mātulam
karavālam atha ākṛṣya krudhyan tam drauṇiḥ ādravat
rudra tulyam tam āyāntam trijagat pralaya kṣamam
nyavārayat svayam rājā naya vāgbhiḥ sa gautamam
droṇi karṇau prasādya atha kuru rāje raṇa unmukhaḥ
viveśa pāṇḍava camūm saha sarvaiḥ mahā rathaiḥ
ākarṇa āñcita kodaṇḍa muktaiḥ karṇa śaraiḥ tathā
abhūt yaudhiṣṭhiram sainyam viprakīrṇam samantataḥ
śara tvālā karālam tam karṇa pāvakam utkaṭam
abhyetya pārtha jaladaḥ bāṇa dhārābhiḥ āvṛṇot
kṣaṇāt atha arjuna śara chinna cāpa ratha dhvajaḥ
karṇaḥ kṛpasya āruha uha ratham bhagna manorathaḥ
dṛṣṭvā duryodhanam vīram yudhyamānam arātibhiḥ
jaghāna pāñcāla camūm drauṇiḥ āhava durmadaḥ
sahasraśas vadhyamānāḥ kṣatra kānana vahninā

original: pāñcālā droṇaputreṇa hataśeṣā diśo yayuḥ // Bhmj_7.606 //
analyzed: pāñcālāḥ droṇaputreṇa hata śeṣāḥ diśaḥ yayuḥ

original: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tato jitvā vīraṃ hatvāsya cānugān /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnam tatas jitvā vīram hatvā asya ca anugān
drauṇiḥ āyodhanam cakre kṛtānta udyāna vibhramam
bhīma arjunābhyām sahitaḥ svayam rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
vidrāvya kauravīm senām droṇa śeṣām iva akarot
somadattam atha āyāntam sātyakiḥ pṛthu vikramam
ayodha vat asaṃbhrāntaḥ kumāraḥ iva tārakam
tad bāṇa śata nirbhinnaḥ vyathām saṃstambya sātyakiḥ
śareṇa aśani tulyena vidārya tam apātayat
tatas droṇa arjuna raṇe divya astra grāma duḥsahe
babhau rakta ambaravatī kālarātrī iva śarvarī
tatas kirīṭi pramukhaiḥ draiṇi kṛpa īritaiḥ

original: sainyānāṃ bhajyamānānāṃ babhūva bhayado ravaḥ // Bhmj_7.612 //
analyzed: sainyānām bhajyamānānām babhūva bhaya daḥ ravaḥ
tatas duryodhana ādeśāt gāḍhe tamasi saṃtataiḥ
dīpaiḥ yuyudhire vīrāḥ gaja aśva id saṅga saṅgibhiḥ
te sene dīpa nikaraiḥ abhitas babhatuḥ kṣaṇāt
hatānām kaṇaśas yātaiḥ tejobhiḥ iva bhūbhujām
virejuḥ tāni anīkāni dīpaiḥ khaḍgeṣu bimbitaiḥ
jvalitāni vanāni iva naktam oṣadhi maṇḍalaiḥ
dīpa dīptāḥ narendrāṇām ratna ābharaṇa rociṣaḥ
tamaḥ kaṣaṇa pāṣāṇe hema lekhāḥ iva ābabhuḥ
tatas vimarda naṣṭeṣu teṣu dīpeṣu saṃgare
niśīthaḥ yauvanam prāpa vairāṇi apanayaiḥ iva
nirvibhāge tatas yuddhe pravṛtte śaurya śālini

original: svayaṃ jite dharmajena sānuge kauraveśvare // Bhmj_7.618 //
analyzed: svayam jite dharmajena sa anuge kaurava īśvare
mṛtyu vīthīm api prāptam sahadevam avārayat

original: na jaghāna raṇe karṇaḥ smarankuntīvaco muhuḥ // Bhmj_7.619 //
analyzed: na jaghāna raṇe karṇaḥ smaran kuntī vacaḥ muhur
tatas karṇa sutaḥ vīraḥ vṛṣasenaḥ riva ahinīm
viveśa astra āvalī jvālā līḍha kṣattriya kānanaḥ
vidrāviteṣu vīreṣu vṛṣasenena sāyakaiḥ
kupitaḥ draupadaḥ roṣāt kuru sainyam vyadārayat
vartamāne raṇe ghore bhāradvājasya paśyataḥ
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ vadhīt vīram drumasenam narādhipam
tatas duryodhana girā droṇa karṇau mahībhujām
kṛttaiḥ śirobhiḥ cakrāte bhuvi padma ākarān iva
dhṛṣṭadyumna mukhān jitvā kṣapita anīka nāyakaḥ
vidrāvya pāṇḍava camūm karṇaḥ cakre nṛpa kṣayam

original: taṃ karṇaṃ sāyakānena kirantaṃ tejasāṃ nidhim /
analyzed: tam karṇam sāyaka anena kirantam tejasām nidhim

original: na sehire pare draṣṭuṃ raṇe tapanasaṃbhavam // Bhmj_7.625 //
analyzed: na sehire pare draṣṭum raṇe tapana saṃbhavam
bhajyamāneṣu anīkeṣu karṇena raṇa śālinā

original: jayāśā pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ sakalā tanutāṃ yayau // Bhmj_7.626 //
analyzed: jaya āśā pāṇḍu putrāṇām sakalā tanu tām yayau
atha kṛṣṇasya vacanāt kṛṣṇa rātrau ghaṭotkacaḥ
avadhīt tvaritam karṇam kṛṣṇā kopaḥ iva āpatan
tasmin abhyudgate dīpta śmaśru jihvā vilocane

original: vāhinyaḥ śatadhā jagmuḥ pratāpapatitā iva // Bhmj_7.628 //
analyzed: vāhinyaḥ śatadhā jagmuḥ pratāpa patitāḥ iva
sa tadā jalada chāyaḥ bhrukuṭī vidyut utkaṭaḥ
sphārābhiḥ śata dhārābhiḥ pārthaḥ karṇam apūrayat
āsthitaḥ tapta hema aṅgam catur hasta śatam ratham
sarva ākārasya lagna agneḥ nīla adreḥ upama akṣamam
daśa hasta parīṇāham dadhānaḥ bhāsuram dhanuḥ
dāva anala prajvalitam mahā sālam iva analaḥ
visphurat sphāra mukuṭaḥ dīpta jāmbūnada aṅgadaḥ
tamaḥ śaila śikhā sajjaḥ babhau vighaṭayan iva
aṭṭahāsa paṭuḥ nādaḥ tasya abhūt tamasām iva

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikaṭājvālaṃ pāṭitānāṃ vyathāravaḥ // Bhmj_7.633 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vikaṭā jvālam pāṭitānām vyathā ravaḥ
vidruteṣu ari sainyeṣu saṃbhoga arheṣu rājasu
rādheya giriḥ eva asya jagrāha śara durdinam
atha aṅgarāja rakṣāyai jaṭāsura sutaḥ balī
kaurava īśvaram āmantrya samabhyāyāt alambuṣaḥ
tatas tasya abhavat horaḥ saṃprahāraḥ prahāriṇā
ghaṭotkacena sa śtra astra śilā pāvaka varṣiṇaḥ
tayoḥ māyā mayāḥ carya kūṭa prakaṭa yodhinoḥ
ūrjitaiḥ śataśas yodhāḥ garjitaiḥ vyasavaḥ bhavat
rathāt ratham abhidrutya tatas bhaimiḥ alambuṣam
dorbhyām mittram iva āliṅgya gāḍha gāḍham apīḍayat
tasya niṣpīḍyamānasya niryayuḥ srotasām mukhaiḥ
sa dhūmāḥ sa anala jvālāḥ sa śabdam śoṇita chaṭāḥ

original: tato bhuvi viniṣpiṣya rāviṇaṃ taṃ ghaṭotkacaḥ /
analyzed: tatas bhuvi viniṣpiṣya rāviṇam tam ghaṭotkacaḥ
uddhṛtya tad śiraḥ vegāt duryodhanam atha āyayau
tam uvāca hataḥ yam te mayā bandhuḥ niśācaraḥ

original: priyasya pātaya śiraḥ punareva nṛpādham // Bhmj_7.641 //
analyzed: priyasya pātaya śiraḥ punar eva nṛpa adham
uktvā etat karṇam abhyāyāt vinadan rajanīcaraḥ
caṇḍa anila samuddhūtaḥ kālam eva iva ākulaḥ
tatas pravṛtte samare ghore rādheya rakṣasoḥ
rāma rāvaṇa saṃgrāmam asmaran vibudhāḥ divi
stambha pramāṇaiḥ viśakhaiḥ jvalitaiḥ ulmukaiḥ iva

original: viddho 'pi rakṣasā karṇo na cacāla mahāśayaḥ // Bhmj_7.644 //
analyzed: viddhaḥ pi rakṣasā karṇaḥ na cacāla mahā āśayaḥ
atha krodha vinirmuktaiḥ vipulaiḥ karṇa sāyakaiḥ
nirbhinnaḥ rākṣasaḥ cakram prāhiṇot karṇa pāvakam
prekṣya cāyat sahasra āram tejaḥ piñjarita ambaram
cakāra khaṇḍaśas cakram karṇaḥ sa āvegam āśugaiḥ
tatas ghaṭotkacaḥ kopāt māyām kṛtvā vimohanīm
piṣṭvā viśālam aviśat nabhaḥ
śānta tejaḥ maye vahnau tārā tāra asthi saṃkule
vyoma śmaśāne tasya āsan matta vetāla koṭayaḥ

original: muhurgajo muhuḥ siṃhaḥ kṣaṇaṃ meghaḥ kṣaṇaṃ giriḥ /
analyzed: muhur gajaḥ muhur siṃhaḥ kṣaṇam meghaḥ kṣaṇam giriḥ
sarva bhūta mahā kāyaḥ varṣan sa vipulāḥ śilāḥ

original: bhuvo vahniṃ divaḥ śastraṃ digbhyo rākṣasamaṇḍalam /
analyzed: bhuvaḥ vahnim divaḥ śastram digbhyaḥ rākṣasa maṇḍalam
visṛjan kuru senāsu vaikartanam ayodhayat

original: tato vidhūya tāṃ māyāṃ karṇo divyāstratejasā /
analyzed: tatas vidhūya tām māyām karṇaḥ divya astra tejasā
nirdahan pāṇḍava camūm rakṣaḥ vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
heḍihan pāṇḍava yātudhānān sahasraśas

original: karṇo dhanuṣmatāṃ dhuryo vibabhau rāmavikramaḥ // Bhmj_7.652 //
analyzed: karṇaḥ dhanuṣmatām dhuryaḥ vibabhau rāma vikramaḥ
aṣṭa aṣṭa cakrām aśanim kāla jihva vibhīṣaṇām

original: bhaimaḥ sasarja karṇāya svayaṃ rudreṇa nirmitām // Bhmj_7.653 //
analyzed: bhaimaḥ sasarja karṇāya svayam rudreṇa nirmitām
visṛṣṭā rākṣasa indreṇa śaila saṃgha pramāthinī
sā bhasmasāt mahā ghoṣā ratham ādhiratheḥ vyadhāt
tatas param samāsthāya syandanam sūtanandanaḥ
piśāca vadanān anyān jaghāna piśitāśinaḥ
virathaḥ kopa hutabhuj jvālā valayita īkṣaṇaḥ
ghaṭotkacaḥ mahā māyaḥ punar antaradhīyata
atrā antare rākṣasa indraḥ bakasya dayitaḥ sakhā
suyodhana abhyanujñātaḥ bīmam āyāt alāyudhaḥ
hayānām hasti karṇānām piśāca mukha varcasām

original: yukte śatena gambhīranirghoṣe syāndane sthitam // Bhmj_7.658 //
analyzed: yukte śatena gambhīra nirghoṣe syāndane sthitam
tam bhīmaḥ pratijagrāha saṃrambha guru garjitam
siddha mantraḥ iva akampaḥ vīraḥ vetālam utthitam
ākīryamāṇaḥ ghoreṇa śila śastra stra varṣiṇā
rākṣasena gadām bhīmaḥ prāhiṇot tad vadha āśayā

original: tāṃ gadāṃ gadayā rakṣo hatvā jāmbūnadāṅgadām /
analyzed: tām gadām gadayā rakṣaḥ hatvā jāmbūnada aṅgadām
nadan akāla jalada dhvāna dhīraḥ kham āviśat
alāyudhena saṃsaktam rajanyām kūṭa yodhinā

original: bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ saṃdehākulito 'bhavat // Bhmj_7.662 //
analyzed: bhīmam dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇam kṛṣṇaḥ saṃdeha ākulitaḥ bhavat
tatas śaureḥ girā vīraḥ pravaraḥ raudra karmaṇām
alāyudham samabhyāyāt tyaktvā karṇam ghaṭotkacaḥ
tayoḥ saṃrabdhayoḥ vyomni saṃnipātaḥ ghana svanaḥ
abhūt bhṛśam śilā śastra nirgharṣa uddhūta pāvakaḥ
citā agni paṅgala śmaśru jaṭā bhīṣaṇayoḥ tayoḥ
danta niṣpeṣa saṃjātāḥ sphuliṅgāḥ iva babhramuḥ
agnikuṇḍa upamānābhyām kuṇḍalābhyām virājitam
alāyudhasya āśu śiraḥ ciccheda ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
tam hatvā vinadan ghoram haiḍimbaḥ ghora vikramaḥ
drutam karṇam samabhyetya śila varṣaiḥ atāḍayat
vaikartanaḥ pi pārthānām kṣapayitvā varūthinīm
ghaṭotkaca saṃbhrāntaḥ śara jālaiḥ apūrayat
atha astreṇa ratham hatvā karṇasya rajanīcaraḥ
trijagat mohanīm māyām samādāya āviśat nabhaḥ
ulmukaiḥ āyudhaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ śilābhiḥ parvataiḥ tathā
sa jaghāna mahā ghoṣaḥ kauravāṇām anīkinīm
niśīthe sarva vīreṣu yudhyamāneṣu rakṣasā
dudruvuḥ pṛthivīpālāḥ bhagna syandana kuñjarāḥ
saṃhāre sarva yodhānām tasmin ati bhayaṃkare

original: niṣkampaḥ samare karṇaḥ sāyakaiḥ khamapūrayat // Bhmj_7.672 //
analyzed: niṣkampaḥ samare karṇaḥ sāyakaiḥ kham apūrayat
gagane vidhyamānānām śilānām karṇa mārgaṇaiḥ
jvālā jāla jaṭālānām abhūt caṭacaṭā ravaḥ
tatas parigha nistriṃśa śataghnī prāsa mudgarāḥ
sa triśūla gadā cakra bhusuṇḍi śara tomarāḥ
karṇa ānane rākṣasena prāsta viṣama yodhinā
cakrire kaurava anīkam hatam kāla śataiḥ iva
vidrute ca tathā sainye rakta kulyā avarohini
vidyamāne nirādhāre rādheye dhairya śālini
svasti iti uktvā prayāteṣu vyomnaḥ siddha sura ṛṣiṣu
akampata jagat sarvam rākṣasa indrasya māyayā
yudhyamānam tatas vīram karṇam abhyetya kauravaḥ
avadat sarva saṃhāra saṃtrāsa āyāsa kātaraḥ
tvayā arjuna vadhe śaktiḥ dhāryate kim anarthakā

original: asminniśīthe ko hyasmānmucyate yaḥ punarjayet // Bhmj_7.679 //
analyzed: asmin niśīthe kaḥ hi asmāt mucyate yaḥ punar jayet
etat ākarṇya rādheyaḥ śakra dattām mahā prabhām
eka vīra vadha āyattām su ciram parirakṣitām
dāraṇīm daitya saṅghānām utsasarja nabhastale
yasyāḥ jvālā āvalī dhāmnā sīmantitam iva abhavat

original: tejasvino rākṣasasya dṛḍhaṃ vakṣo vidārya sā /
analyzed: tejasvinaḥ rākṣasasya dṛḍham vakṣaḥ vidārya sā
jagāma tridivam dīptā prāṇa śaktiḥ iva aparā
dagdha māyaḥ tadā kṣipram haiḍimbaḥ mandara ākṛtiḥ
patan nirbhinna hṛdayaḥ pipeṣa kuru vāhinīm
rātri yuddhe ghaṭotkaca vadhaḥ
hate ghaṭotkace vīre daśakaṇṭha parākrame
prahṛṣṭāḥ kuravaḥ karṇam rāma upamam apūjayan
śakti hīne tatas karṇe nadat kāliya sūdanaḥ
viṣṇo pāṇḍava anīke nanarta ānanda nirbharaḥ
valat pīta aṃśukāḥ tasya nṛtyataḥ vibabhuḥ bhujāḥ
sphūrjati kañjalka paṭalāḥ vāta lolāḥ iva drumāḥ
tam ūce nindayan pārthaḥ haiḍimba vadha duḥkhitaḥ
kaḥ yam viṣāda samaye praharṣaḥ te janārdana
śrutvā etat abravīt kṛṣṇaḥ jitaḥ karṇaḥ dhunā sakhe
haiḍimba vapuṣaḥ prāṇaḥ cintā capala cetasaḥ
śaktiḥ ca karṇa dos daṇḍāt samam yātā jayāya vaḥ
ekalavya jarāsaṃdha śiśupāla ādayaḥ mayā
purā yuddham idam jñātvā durjayāḥ śaktibhiḥ hatāḥ

original: evameva raṇe karṇo na jeyastridaśairapi // Bhmj_7.690 //
analyzed: evam eva raṇe karṇaḥ na jeyaḥ tridaśaiḥ api
kim punar ghorayā pārtha śaktyā vāsava dattayā
tvayi nā utsṛṣṭavān śaktim satatam mohitaḥ mayā

original: karṇa pratiniśaṃ pāpaiḥ preryamāṇo 'pi kauravaiḥ // Bhmj_7.691 //
analyzed: karṇa pratiniśam pāpaiḥ preryamāṇaḥ pi kauravaiḥ
iti uktavati dāśārhe siddha vīra vadha arditāḥ
nirvibhāgam yuyudhire krodha andhāḥ kuru pāṇḍavāḥ
haiḍimbe nihate rājā śoka taptaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
āśvāsitaḥ keśavena kupittaḥ karṇam ādravat
nṛpaiḥ anugataḥ sarvaiḥ praviṣṭaḥ kuru vāhinīm
abhyetya bhagavān vyāsaḥ dharmarājam abhāṣata
diṣṭyā na ādhiratheḥ śaktyā kṛtam jagat an arjunam
adhunā vīra yudhyasva niḥsaṃrambham an ākulaḥ
itas caturbhiḥ divasaiḥ na bhaviṣyanti bhūmipāḥ

original: dharmavīra tjaja krodhaṃ sadā dharmānugo jayaḥ // Bhmj_7.696 //
analyzed: dharma vīra krodham sadā dharma anugaḥ jayaḥ
iti uktvā antarhite vyāse bhīma arjuna yudhiṣṭhirāḥ
cakrire samaram ghoram droṇa karṇa kṛpa ādibhiḥ
sā kālarātriḥ śūrāṇām utsavaḥ yakṣa rakṣasām
sahasra yāma tām yātā triyāmā abūt mahībhujām
tatas nidrā ākule sainye śānte śastra kṛta kṣate

original: dṛṣṭvā jagāda kāruṇyācchvetāśvo yaśasāṃ nidhiḥ // Bhmj_7.699 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā jagāda kāruṇyāt śvetāśvaḥ yaśasām nidhiḥ
muhur te smin nirāloke khinnāḥ sarve mahā rathāḥ
kṣaṇam bhajantu viśrāntim nidrā mukulita īkṣaṇāḥ
iti ukte sainikāḥ sarve praśaṃsantaḥ dhanaṃjayam
kṣaṇam gaja ratha skanda niṣṇṇāḥ tatyajuḥ śramam
niḥsyanda nāga turagāḥ niscala chatra cāmarāḥ
aṅka nyasta āyudha bhāṭāḥ tāḥ senāḥ niścalāḥ bhabhuḥ
athā udyayau vyoma kṛpāṇa paṭṭa danta tsaruḥ kānti sarit marālaḥ
tatas samasta vīrāṇām saṃmukha āhava pātinām
yaśobhiḥ iva śītāṃśuḥ aṃśubhiḥ dyām apūrayat
tuṣāra hara ruciraiḥ kiraṇaiḥ amṛta tviṣaḥ

original: cāmarairiva bhūpālā vījyamānāḥ kṣaṇaṃ babhuḥ // Bhmj_7.705 //
analyzed: cāmaraiḥ iva bhūpālāḥ vījyamānāḥ kṣaṇam babhuḥ
śara iṣu aṅkuritaḥ candraḥ sāndram

original: hareṣu phullito rājñāṃ śaṅkheṣu phalito 'bhavat // Bhmj_7.706 //
analyzed: hareṣu phullitaḥ rājñām śaṅkheṣu phalitaḥ bhavat
pratibimba gataḥ rakta taṭinīṣu niśākaraḥ
babhau saṃdhyā āsavena iva ghūrṇamāna aruṇa chaviḥ
tatas kṣīṇe kṣapā kāle dhvajinī rāja yakṣmaṇi
udyayau śoṇita ātāmraḥ bhagavān vāsara īśvaraḥ
caturtha divase rātri yuddham
duryodhanena vākyalyaiḥ arditaḥ kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ
tatas dadāha divya astraiḥ an astra jñān api krudhā
punar pravṛtte samare nirmaryāde jagat kṣaye
droṇena vadhyamānānām ānandaḥ tumulaḥ bhavat
tasmin akāla kalpa ante rudraḥ kim
saṃhartum udyataḥ lokān iti ūcuḥ vyoma cāriṇaḥ
cedi somaka pāñcāla matsya kekaya sṛñjayāḥ

original: na śarma lebhire vīrāḥ pīḍitā droṇasāyakaiḥ // Bhmj_7.712 //
analyzed: na śarma lebhire vīrāḥ pīḍitāḥ droṇa sāyakaiḥ
tatas virāṭa drupadau bhāradvājam śitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: saṃcchādya cakratuḥ kṣipraṃ vismayaṃ tava dhanvinām // Bhmj_7.713 //
analyzed: saṃcchādya cakratuḥ kṣipram vismayam tava dhanvinām
droṇaḥ tha pārṣata sutān hatvā vipula vikramān
kaṇṭhān jahāra bhallābhyām virāṭa drupadau samam
virāṭa drupada vadhaḥ
matsya pāñcāla senāsu bhagnāsu pavanātmajaḥ
dhṛṣṭadyumna mukhaiḥ sārdham droṇa anīkam upādravat
karṇa saubala hārdikya duḥśāsana mukhāḥ tatas
bhīma pārṣata saineya phalguna ādyān ayodhayan
saṃghaṭṭaḥ sarva vīrāṇām tumule saṃprahāriṇi
āyāt sa ullola kīlāla kulyā kallola mālinī
pāñcāla cedi matsyānām kurvāṇām kadanam raṇe
droṇam vilokya kaṃsāriḥ babhāṣe pāṇḍu nandanam
jāmadagnyasya śiṣyaḥ yam pravṛddhaḥ kṣatriya analaḥ

original: divyāstraduḥsahaśikhaḥ soḍhuṃ naḥ kena pāryate // Bhmj_7.719 //
analyzed: divya astra duḥsaha śikhaḥ soḍhum naḥ kena pāryate
sarva ātmanā yudhyamānaḥ durjayaḥ sa āyudhaḥ guruḥ

original: udyataḥ kartumadyaiva jāne niṣpāṇḍavaṃ jagat // Bhmj_7.720 //
analyzed: udyataḥ kartum adyā eva jāne niṣpāṇḍavam jagat

original: putraṃ tu nihataṃ śrutvā dhruvameṣa na yotsyate /
analyzed: putram tu nihatam śrutvā dhruvam eṣa na yotsyate
tasmāt yuktim upāśritya jaye nītiḥ vidhīyatām
śrutvā etat arjune karṇau pidhāya adhomukha sthite
kathaṃcid abhyupagamāt mūke pāṇḍava bhūpatau
aśvatthāma abhidham hatvā gadayā mada kuñjaram
uccais putra vadham bhīmaḥ droṇam aśrāvayat puras
lajjamānena bhīmena vyāhṛtam bhṛśam apriyam

original: durjayaṃ tanayaṃ matvā droṇo mene na tattathā // Bhmj_7.724 //
analyzed: durjayam tanayam matvā droṇaḥ mene na tat tathā
sa praviśya atha pāñcālān dhṛṣṭadyumna jighāṃsayā
jaghāna vīra yodhānām rathānām ayutāni ṣaḍ
cedi pāñcāla matsyānām brahmastreṇa ugra vikramaḥ
prayutāni adahat kruddhaḥ droṇaḥ rudraḥ iva aparaḥ
nighnan prabhadrakān vīrān somakāḥ ca prahāriṇaḥ
catur varṣa śataḥ darpāt yuvā iva vicacāra saḥ
ṛṣayaḥ tha samabhyetya tam krūratara kāriṇam
tasmāt avārayan ghorāt loka saṃhāra vaiśasāt

original: munisaṃghe gate vyomnā droṇo bhīmavacaḥ smaran /
analyzed: muni saṃghe gate vyomnā droṇaḥ bhīma vacaḥ smaran
yudhiṣṭhiram śaṅkita dhīra pṛcchat satya vikramam
govindena arthitaḥ yatnāt loka saṃhāra śāntaye
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tat eva uktvā svairam hastī iti abhāṣata
a spṛśantaḥ hayāḥ bhūmim avahan ye yudhiṣṭhiram
te nīca gāminaḥ tūrṇam asatya guravaḥ bhavan
tatas sa viṣa nārācaiḥ nirbhinnaḥ iva marmasu
niścitya ātma vadham droṇaḥ citra arpitaḥ iva abhavat
tam jihvā dīpta viśikhaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ vadat drutam

original: aho tanu brāhmaṇo bhūtvā piśitāśīva niṣkṛpaḥ /
analyzed: aho tanu brāhmaṇaḥ bhūtvā piśitāśī iva niṣkṛpaḥ

original: karoṣi kaluṣaṃ karma nihate 'pi priye sute // Bhmj_7.733 //
analyzed: karoṣi kaluṣam karma nihate pi priye sute

original: tacchrutvā sahasā droṇastyaktvā cāpaṃ saha krudhā /
analyzed: tat śrutvā sahasā droṇaḥ tyaktvā cāpam saha krudhā

original: dattvā sarvābhayaṃ maunī dadarśa jyotirāntaram // Bhmj_7.734 //
analyzed: dattvā sarva abhayam maunī dadarśa jyotiḥ āntaram
tasya ṣaṣ kośa saṃghasya saṃpuṭa traya pātanāt
brahmarandhra viniṣkrāntam jyotiḥ vyoma samāviśat
atrā antare samākṛṣya dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śiroruhaiḥ
krodha andhaḥ pāṇḍu tanayaiḥ vāryamāṇaḥ saṃbhramam
guroḥ akṛṣṭa śastrasya dhāmni saṃkrānta tejasaḥ

original: śiro jahāra khaḍgena dhikkṛtaḥ sravarājabhiḥ // Bhmj_7.737 //
analyzed: śiraḥ jahāra khaḍgena dhikkṛtaḥ srava rājabhiḥ
droṇa vadhaḥ
hate rukmarathe vīre gurau sarva dhanuṣmatām

original: saṃbhrāntā dudruvuḥ sarve kauravāṇāṃ mahārathāḥ // Bhmj_7.738 //
analyzed: saṃbhrāntāḥ dudruvuḥ sarve kauravāṇām mahā rathāḥ
bhagnam kuru balam dṛṣṭvā śaṅkitaḥ droṇa nandanaḥ
kim etat iti papraccha sa aśru netram suyodhanam
tasmin adhomukhe duḥkhāt dhoram vaktum anīśvare
tad preritaḥ pitṛ vadham gautamaḥ nyavedayat

original: śrutvā sa vaiśasaṃ ghoraṃ chadmanā vihitaṃ gurau /
analyzed: śrutvā sa vaiśasam ghoram chadmanā vihitam gurau
pāñcālyena nṛśaṃsena jajvāla krodha vahninā
tasya niḥśvasataḥ kopāt kālasya iva didhakṣataḥ
saṃrambhaḥ sarva bhūtānām babhūva ati bhayaṃkaraḥ
niṣpiṣya pāṇinā pāṇim saḥ bravīt sa aśru locanaḥ
aho mama api janakaḥ keśa grahaṇam āptavān
ghātayitvā mṛṣāvādī gurum rājā baka vrataḥ

original: mayi jīvati kaunteyaḥ kathaṃ prāpsyati medinīm // Bhmj_7.744 //
analyzed: mayi jīvati kaunteyaḥ katham prāpsyati medinīm
adya mad kopa nirdagdhe pāṇḍu putre sa rājake
bhārgavasya smariṣyanti vīrāḥ kṣattra kula chidaḥ
kṛtvā adya pārṣata paśum krodha agneḥ upahāra tām
a kṛṣṇa pārthām pṛthivīm eṣaḥ ham kartum udyataḥ
purā mahyam pitā prādāt astram nārāyaṇa uditam
tena adya saṃhṛtān lokān mayā paśyantu khecarāḥ

original: ityuktvā saṃdadhe dhīptaṃ tadastraṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ /
analyzed: iti uktvā saṃdadhe dhīptam tat astram niyataḥ śuciḥ
yena aśvattha dala ālolā vicacāla jagat trayī
tatas nanāda mantha adri kṣubhita ambhodhi niḥsvanam

original: drauṇiryena diśaḥ sarvā yayuḥ śakalatāmiva // Bhmj_7.749 //
analyzed: drauṇiḥ yena diśaḥ sarvāḥ yayuḥ śakala tām iva
tatas vyathitam ālokya sva sainyam śvetavāhanaḥ
jagāda dharmatanayam śvasan anuśaya ākulaḥ
vyājāt vibhava lubdhena śiṣyeṇa nihataḥ guruḥ
iti pralāpa mukhare surarāja sute guroḥ
kopāt ātāmra nayanaḥ provāca pavanātmajaḥ
na nāma muni vat pārtha kṣattriyaḥ vaktum arhasi

original: ghorāpakāre kaḥ śatrau raṇe nyāyamupekṣate // Bhmj_7.752 //
analyzed: ghora apakāre kaḥ śatrau raṇe nyāyam upekṣate
asmin mama bhuje vīre gadā praṇayini sthite

original: tvayi kṛṣṇe ca kiṃ nāma drauṇiślāghābhinandyate // Bhmj_7.753 //
analyzed: tvayi kṛṣṇe ca kim nāma drauṇi ślāghā abhinandyate
iti ukte bhīmasenena pārṣataḥ ūrjunam abravīt
loka antakaḥ vikarma sthaḥ brahmabandhuḥ hataḥ mayā
brahmāstreṇa hataḥ yena mukta varmā pṛthagjanaḥ
sarva upāyaiḥ sa sura vat viśva kaṇṭakaḥ

original: tvayā hataḥ kathaṃ bhīṣmaḥ sa ca prāgjyotiṣeśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tvayā hataḥ katham bhīṣmaḥ sa ca prāgjyotiṣa īśvaraḥ

original: pituḥ sakhā kimetena gahanā vīravṛttayaḥ // Bhmj_7.756 //
analyzed: pituḥ sakhā kim etena gahanāḥ vīra vṛttayaḥ
dhṛṣṭadyumna vacaḥ śrutvā tiryak jihmīkṛta īkṣaṇaḥ
niḥśvasya kopa saṃtaptaḥ dhik dhik iti arjunaḥ bravīt
lajjā nate dharmasute mūkībhūteṣu rājasu
sātyakiḥ kopa saṃtaptaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnam abhāṣata

original: bata pāpa vayaṃ sarve ye gurughnaṃ puraḥ sthitam /
analyzed: bata pāpa vayam sarve ye guru ghnam puras sthitam
svasti vat pratibhāṣante hantavyam tvām prayatnataḥ
iti uktavati śaineye jagāda drupada ātmajaḥ

original: aho nu paradoṣajño nirdeṣa iva bhāṣase // Bhmj_7.760 //
analyzed: aho nu para doṣa jñaḥ iva bhāṣase
bhūriśravāḥ prāya gataḥ kṛtta bāhuḥ kirīṭinā
nṛśaṃsa patita ācāra kena anyena nipātitaḥ
na etat vācyam tvayā bhūpaḥ bāṇaiḥ tvām anyathā śitaiḥ
karomi śikṣā gurubhiḥ vinayau anivartinam
iti bruvāṇau saṃrambhāt tau mithas hantum udyatau
ninyavārayat kṛṣṇa girā bhīmasenaḥ saha anujaiḥ
tatas kṣaṇāt samāvṛtte kuru rāja bala arṇave
droṇa ātmaja astra pihitāḥ na alakṣyanta diśaḥ daśa
nārāyaṇa astra niḥsṛtaiḥ pradīpta āyudha maṇḍalaiḥ
badhyamāna alpa śeṣā abhūt pāṇḍavānām anīkinī
tasmin āyudha saṃgharṣa jāta jvālā śata ākule

original: ghore subhaṭasaṃhāre trasto rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // Bhmj_7.766 //
analyzed: ghore su bhaṭa saṃhāre trastaḥ rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
uvāca pārṣata mukhān vīkṣamāṇaḥ kirīṭinam
palāyantām itas sarve mahat bhayam upasthitam
mādhyasthyam āsthitaḥ jiṣṇuḥ kopitaḥ nidhanāt guroḥ
yena abhimanyuḥ vṛddhena vyājāt bālaḥ nipātitaḥ
satyajit pramukhāḥ yena hatāḥ te te mahā rathāḥ

original: durbhedyaṃ kavacaṃ prādāddivyaṃ duryodhanāya yaḥ // Bhmj_7.769 //
analyzed: durbhedyam kavacam prādāt divyam duryodhanāya yaḥ

original: kriyatāṃ nādhunā yuddhaṃ svasti pārthāya dhīmate /
analyzed: kriyatām na adhunā yuddham svasti pārthāya dhīmate

original: evaṃ vahniṃ pravekṣyāmi drauṇiṃ kālaṃ saheta kaḥ // Bhmj_7.770 //
analyzed: evam vahnim pravekṣyāmi drauṇim kālam saheta kaḥ
iti ukte dharmarājena bhujau utkṣipya keśavaḥ
uccais uvāca bhūpālān jvalitān stra tejasā

original: bho bhoḥ śastraṃ parityajya rathebhyo vrajata kṣitim /
analyzed: bho bhoḥ śastram parityajya rathebhyaḥ vrajata kṣitim

original: astreṇānena hanyante na viśastrā bhuvi sthitāḥ // Bhmj_7.772 //
analyzed: astreṇa anena hanyante na viśastrāḥ bhuvi sthitāḥ
iti bruvāṇe saṃrambhāt sa āvegam kaiṭabhadviṣi
bhīmaḥ babhāṣe bhūpālān abhayam kartum arhatha
eṣaḥ ham samaya prakhyām gadām ādāya daṃśitaḥ
drauṇim abhyudyataḥ hantum paśyantu kuru pāṇḍavāḥ
iti garjantam āyāntam pāvanim droṇa nandanaḥ
hasan mūḍhaḥ yam iti uktvā śara jālaiḥ apūrayat
tatas nārāyaṇa astreṇa dahyamānāḥ samantataḥ
avātaran vāhanebhyaḥ śastrāṇi utsṛjya bhūmipāḥ
rathe sthitam yudhyamānam bhīmasenam asaṃbhramāt
astra jvālā āvalī cakram ekībhūtam samāpatat
prajava agni śikhā kūṭa saṃghaṭṭa antaritam kṣaṇāt
arjunaḥ bhīmam ālokya varuṇa astram avāsṝjat
nārāyaṇa astra dahanaiḥ tat astram abhitas hatam
modhīkṛtam kṣaṇena abhūt a prayuktam iva ambare
mahā astra saṃkaṭe ghore vartamānam vṛkodaram

original: avaruhya rathātkṛṣṇau drāgbhujābhyāṃ vikṛṣya tam // Bhmj_7.780 //
analyzed: avaruhya rathāt kṛṣṇau drāk bhujābhyām vikṛṣya tam
śastram hṛtvā balāt vīram nītvā āśu syandanāt bhuvam

original: vīrau citrojjvalau hṛṣṭau tasthātuḥ kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau // Bhmj_7.781 //
analyzed: vīrau citra ujjvalau hṛṣṭau tasthātuḥ kṛṣṇa pāṇḍavau

original: astre tataḥ svayaṃ śānte prasanne bhuvanatraye /
analyzed: astre tatas svayam śānte prasanne bhuvanatraye

original: ūce duryodhano drauṇiṃ punarastraṃ prayujyatām // Bhmj_7.782 //
analyzed: ūce duryodhanaḥ drauṇim punar astram prayujyatām
dviṣprayojyam na divya astram iti uktvā drauṇiḥ ākulaḥ
śaraiḥ śvakāra pāñcāla matsya kekaya saṃkṣayam

original: sa sātyakiṃ pārṣataṃ ca jitvā vidrāvya vāhinīm /
analyzed: sa sātyakim pārṣatam ca jitvā vidrāvya vāhinīm

original: jaghāna pauravaṃ vīraṃ rājānaṃ ca sudarśanam // Bhmj_7.784 //
analyzed: jaghāna pauravam vīram rājānam ca sudarśanam
pāṇḍu sainyeṣu bhagneṣu drauṇim paścāt abhidrutam
avārayat svayam kruddhaḥ bāṇa varṣaiḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ
prāduścakre tatas ghoram jvālā valayita ambaram
āgneyam astram lokānām kṣayāya drauṇiḥ udyataḥ
atha kāñcana saṃnāhauḥ iva sarve samāvṛtāḥ
mahā astra tejasā vyāptāḥ petuḥ bhūmibhṛtām varāḥ
astreṇa akṣauhiṇīm dagdhām vahni vyāptaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ
dṛṣṭvā prāduścakāra ugram brahmāstram tad praśāntaye
astre tirohite tasmin vimuktau keśava arjunau
dṛṣṭvā droṇa sutaḥ kruddhaḥ dhik astrāṇi iti abhāṣata
atrā antare jñāna sahasraraśmiḥ apāra veda amṛta sindhu setuḥ
sarasvatī mānasa rājahaṃsaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pi akṛṣṇaḥ muniḥ ājagāma

original: rathaṃ samutsṛjya tamugrakarmā praṇamya papraccha gurostanūjaḥ /
analyzed: ratham samutsṛjya tam ugra karmā praṇamya papraccha guroḥ tanūjaḥ

original: astrāṇi divyānyaphalāni kasmātpārthe sakṛṣṇe bhagavangatāni // Bhmj_7.791 //

ṣaṣṭim varṣa sahasrāṇi tapaḥ kṛtvā pinākinam
nārāyaṇaḥ toṣayitvā lebhe tad tulya tām purā

original: sa eṣa durjayaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ svayaṃ liṅgārcanavrataḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa durjayaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ svayam liṅga arcana vrataḥ

original: drauṇe tvamapi rudrāṃśastasmānmā vikriyāṃ gamaḥ // Bhmj_7.794 //
analyzed: drauṇe tvam api rudra aṃśaḥ tasmāt mā vikriyām gamaḥ

original: dhiyā rudraṃ namaskṛtya devau kṛṣṇāvamanyata // Bhmj_7.795 //
analyzed: dhiyā rudram namaskṛtya devau kṛṣṇau amanyata
tatas vahāre sainyānām vihite kuru pāṇḍavaiḥ

original: nivṛttaḥ samarātpārthaḥ pathi vyāsaṃ vyalokayat // Bhmj_7.796 //
analyzed: nivṛttaḥ samarāt pārthaḥ pathi vyāsam vyalokayat

original: dṛṣṭo mayā śūlahastaḥ puruṣo dahanadyutiḥ // Bhmj_7.797 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ mayā śūla hastaḥ puruṣaḥ dahana dyutiḥ
tat śūlinaḥ sṛtaiḥ dīptaiḥ asaṃkhyaiḥ śūla maṇḍalaiḥ

original: kurusenā mayā dṛṣṭā dahyamānā samantataḥ // Bhmj_7.798 //
analyzed: kuru senā mayā dṛṣṭā dahyamānā samantataḥ
krośa ardha spṛṣṭa vasudhaḥ raudraḥ rudraḥ iva aparaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ dhanaṃjayena iti hṛṣye dvaipāyanaḥ bravīt
sa devaḥ tripura arātiḥ gaja asura vimardanaḥ

original: yaṃ namaskṛtya varadaṃ rājante divi devatāḥ /
